[03]‘Jaatiyaapi tva.m idaani na laamakajaatikosi; asambhinnaaya mahaasammatapave.niyaa aagate okkaakaraajava.mse jaato; sirisuddhodanamahaaraajassa ca mahaamaayaadeviyaa ca nattaa; raahulabhaddassa kani.t.tho. Tayaa naama evaruupena jinaputtena hutvaa na yutta.m kusiitena viharitu’nti eva.m ^b^jaatimahatta.m^eb^ paccavekkhatopi uppajjati. ‘Saariputtamoggallaanaa ceva asiitimahaasaavakaa ca viiriyeneva lokuttaradhamma.m pa.tivijjhi.msu. Tva.m etesa.m sabrahmacaariina.m magga.m pa.tipajjasi, nappa.tipajjasii’ti eva.m ^b^sabrahmacaarimahatta.m^eb^ paccavekkhatopi uppajjati.

[03]Kucchi.m puuretvaa .thitaajagarasadise vissa.t.thakaayikacetasikaviiriye kusiitapuggale parivajjentassaapi aaraddhaviiriye pahitatte puggale sevantassaapi .thaananisajjaadiisu viriyuppaadanattha.m ninnapo.napabbhaaracittassaapi uppajjati. Eva.m uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhaavanaapaaripuuri hotiiti pajaanaati.
[03]Piitisambojjha"ngassa ^a^M0.0269^ea^ –

[08]‘‘Atthi ^a^V0.0267^ea^, bhikkhave, piitisambojjha"nga.t.thaaniiyaa dhammaa. Tattha yonisomanasikaarabahuliikaaro – ayamaahaaro anuppannassa vaa piitisambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa piitisambojjha"ngassa bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa sa.mvattatii’’ti (sa.m. ni. 5.232) –
[03]Eva.m uppaado hoti. Tattha piitiyeva piitisambojjha"nga.t.thaaniiyaa dhammaa naama. Tassaa uppaadakamanasikaaro ^a^P0.0282^ea^ yonisomanasikaaro naama.

[03]Apica ekaadasa dhammaa piitisambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya sa.mvattanti – buddhaanussati, dhammasa"nghasiilacaagadevataanussati, upasamaanussati, luukhapuggalaparivajjanataa, siniddhapuggalasevanataa, pasaadaniiyasuttantapaccavekkha.nataa, tadadhimuttataati.

[03]Buddhagu.ne anussarantassaapi hi yaava upacaaraa sakalasariira.m pharamaano piitisambojjha"ngo uppajjati; dhammasa"nghagu.ne anussarantassaapi, diigharatta.m akkha.n.da.m katvaa rakkhita.m catupaarisuddhisiila.m paccavekkhantassaapi, gihino dasasiila.m pa~ncasiila.m paccavekkhantassaapi, dubbhikkhabhayaadiisu pa.niita.m bhojana.m sabrahmacaariina.m datvaa ‘eva.m naama adamhaa’ti caaga.m paccavekkhantassaapi, gihinopi evaruupe kaale siilavantaana.m dinnadaana.m paccavekkhantassaapi, yehi gu.nehi samannaagataa devataa devatta.m pattaa tathaaruupaana.m gu.naana.m attani atthita.m paccavekkhantassaapi, samaapattiyaa vikkhambhite kilese sa.t.thipi sattatipi vassaani na samudaacarantiiti paccavekkhantassaapi, cetiyadassanabodhidassanatheradassanesu asakkaccakiriyaaya sa.msuucitaluukhabhaave buddhaadiisu pasaadasinehaabhaavena gadrabhapi.t.the rajasadise luukhapuggale parivajjentassaapi, buddhaadiisu pasaadabahule muducitte siniddhapuggale sevantassaapi, ratanattayagu.naparidiipake pasaadaniiyasuttante paccavekkhantassaapi, .thaananisajjaadiisu piitiuppaadanattha.m ninnapo.napabbhaaracittassaapi uppajjati. Eva.m uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhaavanaapaaripuuri hotiiti pajaanaati.
[03]Passaddhisambojjha"ngassa ^a^M0.0270^ea^ –

[08]‘‘Atthi ^a^V0.0268^ea^, bhikkhave, kaayapassaddhi cittapassaddhi. Tattha yonisomanasikaarabahuliikaaro – ayamaahaaro anuppannassa vaa passaddhisambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa passaddhisambojjha"ngassa bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa sa.mvattatii’’ti (sa.m. ni. 5.232) –

[03]Eva.m uppaado hoti. Apica satta dhammaa passaddhisambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya sa.mvattanti – pa.niitabhojanasevanataa, utusukhasevanataa ^a^P0.0283^ea^, iriyaapathasukhasevanataa, majjhattapayogataa, saaraddhakaayapuggalaparivajjanataa, passaddhikaayapuggalasevanataa, tadadhimuttataati. Pa.niita~nhi siniddha.m sappaayabhojana.m bhu~njantassaapi, siitu.nhesu utuusu .thaanaadiisu ca iriyaapathesu sappaaya.m utu~nca iriyaapatha~nca sevantassaapi passaddhi uppajjati. Yo pana mahaapurisajaatiko sabbautuiriyaapathakkhamova hoti, na ta.m sandhaayeta.m vutta.m. Yassa sabhaagavisabhaagataa atthi, tasseva visabhaage utuiriyaapathe vajjetvaa sabhaage sevantassaapi uppajjati. Majjhattapayogo vuccati attano ca parassa ca kammassakatapaccavekkha.naa; iminaa majjhattapayogena uppajjati. Yo le.d.duda.n.daadiihi para.m vihe.thayamaanova vicarati, evaruupa.m saaraddhakaaya.m puggala.m parivajjentassaapi, sa.myatapaadapaa.ni.m passaddhakaaya.m puggala.m sevantassaapi, .thaananisajjaadiisu passaddhiuppaadanatthaaya ninnapo.napabbhaaracittassaapi uppajjati. Eva.m uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhaavanaapaaripuuri hotiiti pajaanaati.
[03]Samaadhisambojjha"ngassa –

[08]‘‘Atthi, bhikkhave, samathanimitta.m abyagganimitta.m. Tattha yonisomanasikaarabahuliikaaro – ayamaahaaro anuppannassa vaa samaadhisambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa samaadhisambojjha"ngassa bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa sa.mvattatii’’ti (sa.m. ni. 5.232) –
[03]Eva.m uppaado hoti. Tattha samathova samathanimitta.m, avikkhepa.t.thena ca abyagganimittanti.

[03]Apica ^a^M0.0271^ea^ ekaadasa dhammaa samaadhisambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya sa.mvattanti – vatthuvisadakiriyataa ^a^V0.0269^ea^, indriyasamattapa.tipaadanataa, nimittakusalataa, samaye cittassa pagga.nhanataa, samaye cittassa niggaha.nanataa, samaye sampaha.msanataa, samaye ajjhupekkha.nataa, asamaahitapuggalaparivajjanataa, samaahitapuggalasevanataa, jhaanavimokkhapaccavekkha.nataa, tadadhimuttataati. Tattha ^b^vatthuvisadakiriyataa^eb^ ca ^b^indriyasamattapa.tipaadanataa^eb^ ca vuttanayeneva veditabbaa.

[03]^b^Nimittakusalataa^eb^ naama kasi.nanimittassa uggaha.nakusalataa. ^b^Samaye cittassa paggaha.nanataa^eb^ti yasmi.m samaye atisithilaviiriyataadiihi ^a^P0.0284^ea^ liina.m citta.m hoti, tasmi.m samaye dhammavicayaviiriyapiitisambojjha"ngasamu.t.thaapanena tassa pagga.nhana.m. ^b^Samaye cittassa niggaha.nanataa^eb^ti yasmi.m samaye accaaraddhaviiriyataadiihi uddha.ta.m citta.m hoti, tasmi.m samaye passaddhisamaadhiupekkhaasambojjha"ngasamu.t.thaapanena tassa nigga.nhana.m. ^b^Samaye sampaha.msanataa^eb^ti yasmi.m samaye citta.m pa~n~naapayogamandataaya vaa upasamasukhaanadhigamena vaa nirassaada.m hoti, tasmi.m samaye a.t.thasa.mvegavatthupaccavekkha.nena sa.mvejeti. ^b^A.t.tha sa.mvegavatthuuni^eb^ naama jaatijaraabyaadhimara.naani cattaari, apaayadukkha.m pa~ncama.m, atiite va.t.tamuulaka.m dukkha.m, anaagate va.t.tamuulaka.m dukkha.m, paccuppanne aahaarapariye.t.thimuulaka.m dukkhanti. Ratanattayagu.naanussara.nena ca pasaada.m janeti. Aya.m vuccati samaye sampaha.msanataati.

[03]^b^Samaye ajjhupekkhanataa^eb^ naama yasmi.m samaye sammaapa.tipatti.m aagamma aliina.m anuddha.ta.m anirassaada.m aaramma.ne samappavatta.m samathaviithipa.tipanna.m citta.m hoti, tadaaya.m paggahaniggahasampaha.msanesu na byaapaara.m aapajjati saarathii viya samappavattesu assesu. Aya.m vuccati samaye ajjhupekkhanataati. ^b^Asamaahitapuggalaparivajjanataa^eb^ naama upacaara.m vaa appana.m vaa appattaana.m vikkhittacittaana.m puggalaana.m aarakaa parivajjana.m. ^b^Samaahitapuggalasevanataa^eb^ naama upacaarena vaa appanaaya vaa samaahitacittaana.m sevanaa bhajanaa payirupaasanaa. ^b^Tadadhimuttataa^eb^ naama .thaananisajjaadiisu samaadhiuppaadanattha.myeva ninnapo.napabbhaaracittataa. Eva~nhi pa.tipajjato esa uppajjati. Eva.m uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhaavanaapaaripuuri hotiiti pajaanaati.
[03]Upekkhaasambojjha"ngassa –

[08]‘‘Atthi, bhikkhave, upekkhaasambojjha"nga.t.thaaniiyaa dhammaa. Tattha yonisomanasikaarabahuliikaaro ^a^V0.0270^ea^ – ayamaahaaro anuppannassa ^a^M0.0272^ea^ vaa upekkhaasambojjha"ngassa ^a^P0.0285^ea^ uppaadaaya, uppannassa vaa upekkhaasambojjha"ngassa bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa sa.mvattatii’’ti (sa.m. ni. 5.232) –

[03]Eva.m uppaado hoti. Tattha upekkhaava upekkhaasambojjha"nga.t.thaaniiyaa dhammaa naama. Apica pa~nca dhammaa upekkhaasambojjha"ngassa uppaadaaya sa.mvattanti – sattamajjhattataa, sa"nkhaaramajjhattataa, sattasa"nkhaarakelaayanapuggalaparivajjanataa, sattasa"nkhaaramajjhattapuggalasevanataa, tadadhimuttataati.

[03]Tattha dviihaakaarehi ^b^sattamajjhattata.m^eb^ samu.t.thaapeti – ‘tva.m attano kammena aagantvaa attanova kammena gamissasi. Esopi attano kammena aagantvaa attanova kammena gamissati. Tva.m ka.m kelaayasii’ti eva.m kammassakatapaccavekkha.nena ca ‘paramatthato sattoyeva natthi. So tva.m ka.m kelaayasii’ti eva.m nissattapaccavekkha.nena ca. Dviihevaakaarehi ^b^sa"nkhaaramajjhattata.m^eb^ samu.t.thaapeti – ‘ida.m ciivara.m anupubbena va.n.navikaara~nceva ji.n.nabhaava~nca upagantvaa paadapu~nchanaco.laka.m hutvaa ya.t.thiko.tiyaa cha.d.daniiya.m bhavissati. Sace panassa saamiko bhaveyya, naassa eva.m vinassitu.m dadeyyaa’ti eva.m assaamikabhaavapaccavekkha.nena ca. ‘Anaddhaniya.m ida.m taavakaalika’nti eva.m taavakaalikabhaavapaccavekkha.nena ca. Yathaa ca ciivare, eva.m pattaadiisupi yojanaa kaatabbaa.

[03]^b^Sattasa"nkhaarakelaayanapuggalaparivajjanataa^eb^ti ettha yo puggalo gihii vaa attano puttadhiitaadike, pabbajito vaa attano antevaasikasamaanupajjhaayakaadike mamaayati, sahattheneva nesa.m kesacchedanasuucikammaciivaradhovanarajanapattapacanaadiini karoti, muhuttampi apassanto ‘asuko saama.nero kuhi.m? Asuko daharo kuhi’nti? Bhantamigo viya ito cito ca aaloketi; a~n~nena kesacchedanaadiina.m atthaaya ‘muhutta.m taava asuka.m pesethaa’ti yaaciyamaanopi ‘amhepi ta.m attano kamma.m na kaarema, tumhe na.m gahetvaa kilamessathaa’ti na deti – aya.m ^b^sattakelaayano^eb^ naama.

[03]Yo ^a^M0.0273^ea^ pana ciivarapattathaalakakattaraya.t.thiaadiini ^a^P0.0286^ea^ mamaayati, a~n~nassa hatthena paraamasitumpi na deti, taavakaalika.m yaacitopi ‘mayampi ima.m mamaayantaa na paribhu~njaama, tumhaaka.m ki.m dassaamaa’ti vadati – aya.m ^b^sa"nkhaarakelaayano^eb^ naama. Yo pana tesu dviisupi vatthuusu majjhatto udaasiino – aya.m ^b^sattasa"nkhaaramajjhatto^eb^ naama. Iti aya.m upekkhaasambojjha"ngo evaruupe sattasa"nkhaarakelaayanapuggale ^a^V0.0271^ea^ aarakaa parivajjentassaapi, sattasa"nkhaaramajjhattapuggale sevantassaapi, .thaananisajjaadiisu taduppaadanattha.m ninnapo.napabbhaaracittassaapi uppajjati. Eva.m uppannassa panassa arahattamaggena bhaavanaapaaripuuri hotiiti pajaanaati. Sesa.m sabbattha uttaanatthamevaati.
[06]Bojjha"ngapabbava.n.nanaa.

[03]Imesupi dviisu pabbesu suddhavipassanaava kathitaa. Iti ime cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa pubbabhaage naanaacittesu labbhanti. A~n~neneva hi cittena kaaya.m parigga.nhaati, a~n~nena vedana.m, a~n~nena citta.m, a~n~nena dhamme parigga.nhaati; lokuttaramaggakkha.ne pana ekacitteyeva labbhanti. AAdito hi kaaya.m parigga.nhitvaa aagatassa vipassanaasampayuttaa sati ^b^kaayaanupassanaa^eb^ naama. Taaya satiyaa samannaagato puggalo ^b^kaayaanupassii^eb^ naama. Vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa ariyamagga.m pattassa maggakkha.ne maggasampayuttaa sati kaayanupassanaa naama. Taaya satiyaa samannaagato puggalo kaayaanupassii naama. Vedana.m parigga.nhitvaa…. Citta.m parigga.nhitvaa…. Dhamme parigga.nhitvaa aagatassa vipassanaasampayuttaa sati ^b^dhammaanupassanaa^eb^ naama. Taaya satiyaa samannaagato puggalo ^b^dhammaanupassii^eb^ naama. Vipassana.m ussukkaapetvaa ariyamagga.m pattassa maggakkha.ne maggasampayuttaa sati dhammaanupassanaa naama. Taaya satiyaa samannaagato puggalo dhammaanupassii naama. Eva.m taava desanaa puggale ti.t.thati. Kaaye pana ‘subha’nti vipallaasappahaanaa kaayapariggaahikaa sati maggena samijjhatiiti kaayaanupassanaa naama. Vedanaaya ‘sukha’nti vipallaasappahaanaa vedanaapariggaahikaa sati maggena samijjhatiiti vedanaanupassanaa naama. Citte ‘nicca’nti vipallaasappahaanaa cittapariggaahikaa sati maggena samijjhatiiti cittaanupassanaa naama. Dhammesu ‘attaa’ti vipallaasappahaanaa dhammapariggaahikaa ^a^P0.0287^ea^ sati maggena samijjhatiiti dhammaanupassanaa naama. Iti ekaava maggasampayuttaa sati catukiccasaadhana.t.thena cattaari ^a^M0.0274^ea^ naamaani labhati. Tena vutta.m – ‘lokuttaramaggakkha.ne pana ekacitteyeva labbhantii’ti.
[06]Suttantabhaajaniiyava.n.nanaa.

[03]^b^374^eb^^b^.^eb^ Abhidhammabhaajaniiye ^a^V0.0272^ea^ lokuttarasatipa.t.thaanavasena desanaaya aaraddhattaa yathaa kaayaadiaaramma.nesu lokiyasatipa.t.thaanesu tanti .thapitaa, eva.m a.t.thapetvaa sabbaanipi kaayaanupassaadiini satipa.t.thaanaani dhammasa"nga.niya.m (dha. sa. 355 aadayo) vibhattassa desanaanayassa mukhamattameva dassentena niddi.t.thaani.

[03]Tattha nayabhedo veditabbo. Katha.m? Kaayaanupassanaaya taava sotaapattimagge jhaanaabhinivese suddhikapa.tipadaa, suddhikasu~n~nataa, su~n~natapa.tipadaa, suddhikaappa.nihita.m, appa.nihitapa.tipadaati imesu pa~ncasu .thaanesu dvinna.m dvinna.m catukkapa~ncakanayaana.m vasena dasa nayaa honti. Eva.m sesesupiiti viisatiyaa abhinivesesu dve nayasataani. Taani catuuhi adhipatiihi catugu.nitaani a.t.tha. Iti suddhikaani dve saadhipatiini a.t.thaati sabbampi nayasahassa.m hoti. Tathaa vedanaanupassanaadiisu suddhikasatipa.t.thaane caati sotaapattimagge pa~nca nayasahassaani. Yathaa ca sotaapattimagge, eva.m sesamaggesupiiti kusale viisati nayasahassaani; su~n~nataapa.nihitaanimittaadibhedesu pana tato tigu.ne vipaake sa.t.thi nayasahassaaniiti. Evameva sakiccasaadhakaana~nceva sa.msiddhikakiccaana~nca kusalavipaakasatipa.t.thaanaana.m niddesavasena duvidho kaayaanupassanaadivasena ca suddhikavasena ca kusale pa~ncanna.m vipaake pa~ncannanti dasanna.m niddesavaaraana.m vasena dasappabhedo asiitinayasahassapatima.n.dito abhidhammabhaajaniiyaniddeso.

[03]^b^386^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pa~nhaapucchake paa.lianusaareneva satipa.t.thaanaana.m kusalaadibhaavo veditabbo. AAramma.nattikesu pana sabbaanipi etaani appamaa.na.m nibbaana.m ^a^M0.0275^ea^ aarabbha pavattanato appamaa.naaramma.naaneva, na maggaaramma.naani; sahajaatahetuvasena pana maggahetukaani; viiriya.m vaa viima.msa.m vaa je.t.thaka.m katvaa maggabhaavanaakaale maggaadhipatiini; chandacittaje.t.thakaaya ^a^P0.0288^ea^ maggabhaavanaaya navattabbaani maggaadhipatiiniiti phalakaalepi navattabbaaneva; atiitaadiisu ekaaramma.nabhaavenapi navattabbaani; nibbaanassa pana bahiddhaadhammattaa bahiddhaaramma.naani naama hontiiti. Evametasmi.m pa~nhaapucchake nibbattitalokuttaraaneva satipa.t.thaanaani kathitaani. Sammaasambuddhena hi suttantabhaajaniiyasmi.myeva ^a^V0.0273^ea^ lokiyalokuttaramissakaa satipa.t.thaanaa kathitaa; abhidhammabhaajaniiyapa~nhaapucchakesu pana lokuttaraayevaati. Evamaya.m satipa.t.thaanavibha"ngopi tepariva.t.ta.m niiharitvaa bhaajetvaa dassitoti.
[06]Sammohavinodaniyaa vibha"nga.t.thakathaaya
[06]Satipa.t.thaanavibha"ngava.n.nanaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03]^b^390^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idaani ^a^P0.0289^ea^^a^M0.0276^ea^^a^V0.0274^ea^ tadanantare sammappadhaanavibha"nge ^b^cattaaro^eb^ti ga.nanaparicchedo. Tena na tato he.t.thaa na uddhanti sammappadhaanapariccheda.m diipeti. ^b^Sammappadhaanaa^eb^ti kaara.nappadhaanaa upaayappadhaanaa yonisopadhaanaa. ^b^Idha bhikkhuu^eb^ti imasmi.m saasane pa.tipannako bhikkhu. ^b^Anuppannaana^eb^nti anibbattaana.m. ^b^Paapakaana^eb^nti laamakaana.m. ^b^Akusalaana.m dhammaana^eb^nti akosallasambhuutaana.m dhammaana.m. ^b^Anuppaadaayaa^eb^ti na uppaadanatthaaya. ^b^Chanda.m janetii^eb^ti kattukamyataasa"nkhaata.m kusalacchanda.m janeti uppaadeti. ^b^Vaayamatii^eb^ti payoga.m parakkama.m karoti. ^b^Viiriya.m aarabhatii^eb^ti kaayikacetasika.m viiriya.m karoti. ^b^Citta.m pagga.nhaatii^eb^ti teneva sahajaataviiriyena citta.m ukkhipati. ^b^Padahatii^eb^ti padhaanaviiriya.m karoti. Pa.tipaa.tiyaa panetaani cattaaripi padaani aasevanaabhaavanaabahuliikammasaataccakiriyaahi yojetabbaani.

[03]^b^Uppannaana.m paapakaana^eb^nti anuppannanti avattabbata.m aapannaana.m paapadhammaana.m. ^b^Pahaanaayaa^eb^ti pajahanatthaaya. ^b^Anuppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana^eb^nti anibbattaana.m kosallasambhuutaana.m dhammaana.m. ^b^Uppaadaayaa^eb^ti uppaadanatthaaya. ^b^Uppannaana^eb^nti nibbattaana.m. ^b^.Thitiyaa^eb^ti .thitatthaaya. ^b^Asammosaayaa^eb^ti anassanattha.m. ^b^Bhiyyobhaavaayaa^eb^ti punappuna.m bhaavaaya. ^b^Vepullaayaa^eb^ti ^a^P0.0290^ea^ vipulabhaavaaya. ^b^Bhaavanaayaa^eb^ti va.d.dhiyaa. ^b^Paaripuuriyaa^eb^ti paripuura.natthaaya. Aya.m taava catunna.m sammappadhaanaana.m uddesavaaravasena ekapadiko atthuddhaaro.

[03]^b^391^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idaani pa.tipaa.tiyaa taani padaani bhaajetvaa dassetu.m ^b^katha~nca bhikkhu anuppannaana^eb^ntiaadinaa ^a^V0.0275^ea^ nayena niddesavaaro aaraddho. Tattha ya.m he.t.thaa dhammasa"ngahe aagatasadisa.m, ta.m tassa va.n.nanaaya.m vuttanayeneva veditabba.m. Ya.m pana tasmi.m anaagata.m, tattha chandaniddese taava ^b^yo chando^eb^ti yo chandaniyavasena chando. ^b^Chandikataa^eb^ti chandikabhaavo, chandakara.naakaaro vaa. ^b^Kattukamyataa^eb^ti kattukaamataa. ^b^Kusalo^eb^ti cheko. ^b^Dhammacchando^eb^ti sabhaavacchando. Aya~nhi chando naama ta.nhaachando, di.t.thichando, viiriyachando, dhammacchandoti bahuvidho naanappakaarako. Tesu ^a^M0.0277^ea^ dhammacchandoti imasmi.m .thaane kattukamyataakusaladhammacchando adhippeto.

[03]^b^Ima.m chanda.m janetii^eb^ti chanda.m kurumaanova chanda.m janeti naama. ^b^Sa~njanetii^eb^ti upasaggena pada.m va.d.dhita.m. ^b^U.t.thapetii^eb^ti chanda.m kurumaanova ta.m u.t.thapeti naama. ^b^Samu.t.thapetii^eb^ti upasaggena pada.m va.d.dhita.m. ^b^Nibbattetii^eb^ti chanda.m kurumaanova ta.m nibbatteti naama. ^b^Abhinibbattetii^eb^ti upasaggena pada.m va.d.dhita.m. Apica chanda.m karontova chanda.m ^b^janeti^eb^ naama. Tameva satata.m karonto ^b^sa~njaneti^eb^ naama. Kenacideva antaraayena patita.m puna ukkhipanto ^b^u.t.thapeti^eb^ naama. Pabandha.t.thiti.m paapento ^b^samu.t.thapeti^eb^ naama. Ta.m paaka.ta.m karonto ^b^nibbatteti^eb^ naama. Anosakkanataaya aliinavuttitaaya anoliinavuttitaaya abhimukhabhaavena nibbattento ^b^abhinibbatteti^eb^ naama.

[03]^b^394^eb^^b^.^eb^ Viiriyaniddese viiriya.m karontova viiriya.m ^b^aarabhati^eb^ naama. Dutiyapada.m upasaggena va.d.dhita.m. Viiriya.m ^a^P0.0291^ea^ karontoyeva ca ^b^aasevati bhaaveti^eb^ naama. Punappuna.m karonto ^b^vahuliikaroti^eb^. AAditova karonto ^b^aarabhati^eb^. Punappuna.m karonto ^b^samaarabhati^eb^. Bhaavanaavasena bhajanto ^b^aasevati^eb^. Va.d.dhento ^b^bhaaveti^eb^. Sabbakiccesu tadeva bahuliikaronto ^b^bahuliikarotii^eb^ti veditabbo.

[03]^b^395^eb^^b^.^eb^ Cittapaggahaniddese viiriyapaggahena yojento citta.m ^b^pagga.nhaati,^eb^ ukkhipatiiti attho. Punappuna.m pagga.nhanto ^b^sampagga.nhaati^eb^. Eva.m sampaggahita.m yathaa na patati tathaa na.m viiriyupatthambhena upatthambhento ^b^upatthambheti^eb^. Upatthambhitampi thirabhaavatthaaya punappuna.m upatthambhento ^b^paccupatthambheti^eb^ naama.

[03]^b^406^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^.Thitiyaa^eb^tipadassa niddese sabbesampi asammosaadiina.m .thitivevacanabhaava.m dassetu.m ^b^yaa .thiti so asammoso^eb^tiaadi vutta.m. Ettha hi he.t.thima.m he.t.thima.m pada.m uparimassa uparimassa padassa ^a^V0.0276^ea^ attho, uparima.m uparima.m pada.m he.t.thimassa he.t.thimassa atthotipi vattu.m va.t.tati. Sesa.m sabbattha uttaanatthamevaati. Aya.m taava paa.liva.n.nanaa.

[03]Aya.m panettha vinicchayakathaa. Aya~nhi sammappadhaanakathaa naama duvidhaa – lokiyaa lokuttaraa ca. Tattha lokiyaa sabbapubbabhaage hoti. Saa ^a^M0.0278^ea^ kassapasa.myuttapariyaayena lokiyamaggakkha.ne veditabbaa. Vutta~nhi tattha –
[08]‘‘Cattaaro me, aavuso, sammappadhaanaa. Katame cattaaro?

[08]Idhaavuso, bhikkhu ‘anuppannaa me paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa uppajjamaanaa anatthaaya sa.mvatteyyu’nti aatappa.m karoti; ‘uppannaa me paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa appahiiyamaanaa anatthaaya sa.mvatteyyu’nti aatappa.m karoti; ‘anuppannaa me kusalaa dhammaa anuppajjamaanaa anatthaaya sa.mvatteyyu’nti aatappa.m karoti. ‘Uppannaa me kusalaa dhammaa nirujjhamaanaa anatthaaya sa.mvatteyyu’nti aatappa.m karotii’’ti (sa.m. ni. 2.145).

[03]Ettha ca ^b^‘anuppannaa me kusalaa dhammaa’^eb^ti samathavipassanaa ceva maggo ca. ^b^Uppannaa^eb^^a^P0.0292^ea^^b^kusalaa^eb^ naama samathavipassanaava. Maggo pana saki.m uppajjitvaa nirujjhamaano anatthaaya sa.mvattanako naama natthi. So hi phalassa paccaya.m datvaava nirujjhati. Purimasmi.m vaa samathavipassanaava gahetabbaati vutta.m, ta.m pana na yutta.m.

[03]Tattha ‘‘uppannaa samathavipassanaa nirujjhamaanaa anatthaaya sa.mvattantii’’ti atthassa aavibhaavattha.m ida.m vatthu – eko kira khii.naasavatthero ‘mahaacetiya~nca mahaabodhi~nca vandissaamii’ti samaapattilaabhinaa bha.n.dagaahakasaama.nerena saddhi.m janapadato mahaavihaara.m aagantvaa vihaaraparive.na.m paavisi; saayanhasamaye mahaabhikkhusa"nghe cetiya.m vandamaane cetiya.m vandanatthaaya na nikkhami. Kasmaa? Khii.naasavaana~nhi tiisu ratanesu mahanta.m gaarava.m hoti. Tasmaa bhikkhusa"nghe vanditvaa pa.tikkante manussaana.m saayamaasabhuttavelaaya saama.nerampi ajaanaapetvaa ‘cetiya.m vandissaamii’ti ekakova nikkhami. Saama.nero ‘ki.m nu kho thero avelaaya ekakova gacchati, jaanissaamii’ti upajjhaayassa padaanupadikova nikkhami. Thero anaavajjanena tassa aagamana.m ^a^V0.0277^ea^ ajaananto dakkhi.nadvaarena mahaacetiya"nga.na.m aaru.lho. Saama.neropi anupada.myeva aaru.lho.

[03]Mahaathero ^a^M0.0279^ea^ mahaacetiya.m ulloketvaa buddhaaramma.na.m piiti.m gahetvaa sabba.m cetaso samannaaharitvaa ha.t.thapaha.t.tho mahaacetiya.m vandati. Saama.nero therassa vandanaakaara.m disvaa ‘upajjhaayo me ativiya pasannacitto vandati; ki.m nu kho pupphaani labhitvaa puuja.m kareyyaa’ti cintesi. There vanditvaa u.t.thaaya sirasi a~njali.m .thapetvaa mahaacetiya.m ulloketvaa .thite saama.nero ukkaasitvaa attano aagatabhaava.m jaanaapesi. Thero parivattetvaa olokento ‘‘kadaa aagatosii’’ti pucchi. ‘‘Tumhaaka.m cetiya.m vandanakaale, bhante; ativiya pasannaa cetiya.m vandittha; kinnu kho pupphaani labhitvaa puujeyyaathaa’’ti? ‘‘AAma, saama.nera, imasmi.m cetiye viya a~n~natra ettaka.m dhaatunidhaana.m naama natthi. Evaruupa.m asadisa.m mahaathuupa.m pupphaani labhitvaa ko na puujeyyaa’’ti? ‘‘Tena hi, bhante, adhivaasetha, aaharissaamii’’ti taavadeva jhaana.m samaapajjitvaa iddhiyaa himavanta.m gantvaa va.n.nagandhasampannaani pupphaani gahetvaa parissaavana.m puuretvaa mahaathere ^a^P0.0293^ea^ dakkhi.namukhato pacchimamukhe asampatteyeva aagantvaa pupphaparissaavana.m hatthe .thapetvaa ‘‘puujetha bhante’’ti aaha. Thero ‘‘atimandaani no, saama.nera, pupphaanii’’ti aaha. ‘‘Gacchatha, bhante, bhagavato gu.ne aavajjetvaa puujethaa’’ti.

[03]Thero pacchimamukhanissitena sopaanena aaruyha kucchivedikaabhuumiya.m pupphapuuja.m kaatu.m aaraddho. Vedikaabhuumi paripu.n.naa; pupphaani patitvaa dutiyabhuumiya.m ja.n.nuppamaa.nena odhinaa puurayi.msu. Tato otaritvaa paadapi.t.thikapanti.m puujesi; saapi paripuuri; paripu.n.nabhaava.m ~natvaa he.t.thimatale vikiranto agamaasi; sabba.m cetiya"nga.na.m paripuuri; tasmi.m paripu.n.ne ‘‘saama.nera, pupphaani na khiiyantii’’ti aaha. ‘‘Parissaavana.m, bhante, adhomukha.m karothaa’’ti. Adhomukha.m katvaa caalesi. Tadaa pupphaani khii.naani. Thero parissaavana.m saama.nerassa datvaa saddhi.m hatthipaakaarena cetiya.m tikkhattu.m padakkhi.na.m katvaa catuusu .thaanesu vanditvaa parive.na.m gacchanto cintesi – ‘yaava mahiddhiko vataaya.m saama.nero; sakkhissati nu kho ima.m iddhaanubhaava.m rakkhitunti? Tato ‘na sakkhissatii’ti disvaa saama.nera.m aaha – ‘‘saama.nera, tva.m idaani mahiddhiko; evaruupa.m pana iddhi.m naasetvaa pacchimakaale ^a^M0.0280^ea^ kaa.napesakaariyaa hatthena maddita.mka~njiya.m pivissasii’’ti. Daharakabhaavassa naamesa doso ya.m so upajjhaayassa kathaaya sa.mvejetvaa ‘kamma.t.thaana.m ^a^V0.0278^ea^ me, bhante, aacikkhathaa’ti na yaaci; ‘amhaaka.m upajjhaayo ki.m vadatii’ti ta.m pana asu.nanto viya agamaasi.

[03]Thero mahaacetiya~nca mahaabodhi~nca vanditvaa saama.nera.m pattaciivara.m gaahaapetvaa anupubbena ku.te.litissamahaavihaara.m agamaasi. Saama.nero upajjhaayassa padaanupadiko hutvaa bhikkhaacaara.m na gacchati. ‘‘Katara.m gaama.m pavisatha, bhante’’ti pucchitvaa pana ‘idaani me upajjhaayo gaamadvaara.m sampatto bhavissatii’ti ~natvaa attano ca upajjhaayassa ca pattaciivara.m gahetvaa aakaasenaagantvaa therassa pattaciivara.m datvaa ^a^P0.0294^ea^ pi.n.daaya pavisati. Thero sabbakaala.m ovadati – ‘‘saama.nera, maa evamakaasi; puthujjaniddhi naama calaa anibaddhaa; asappaaya.m ruupaadiaaramma.na.m labhitvaa appamattakeneva bhijjati; santaaya samaapattiyaa parihiinaa brahmacariyavaase santhambhitu.m na sakkontii’’ti. Saama.nero ‘ki.m katheti mayha.m upajjhaayo’ti sotu.m na icchati, tatheva karoti. Thero anupubbena cetiyavandana.m karonto kammupendavihaara.m naama gato. Tattha vasantepi there saama.nero tatheva karoti.

[03]Athekadivasa.m ekaa pesakaaradhiitaa abhiruupaa pa.thamavaye .thitaa kammupendagaamato nikkhamitvaa padumassara.m oruyha gaayamaanaa pupphaani bha~njati. Tasmi.m samaye saama.nero padumassaramatthakena gacchati gacchanto pana, sakkaralasikaaya kaa.namakkhikaa viya, tassaa giitasadde bajjhi; taavadeva iddhi antarahitaa, chinnapakkho kaako viya ahosi. Santasamaapattibalena pana tattheva udakapi.t.the apatitvaa simbalituula.m viya patamaana.m anupubbena padumassaratiire a.t.thaasi. So vegena gantvaa upajjhaayassa pattaciivara.m datvaa nivatti. Mahaathero ‘pageveta.m mayaa di.t.tha.m, nivaariyamaanopi na nivattissatii’ti ki~nci avatvaa pi.n.daaya paavisi.

[03]Saama.nero gantvaa padumassaratiire a.t.thaasi tassaa paccuttara.na.m aagamayamaano. Saapi saama.nera.m aakaasena gacchanta~nca punaagantvaa .thita~nca disvaa ‘addhaa ^a^M0.0281^ea^ esa ma.m nissaaya ukka.n.thito’ti ~natvaa ‘pa.tikkama saama.neraa’ti aaha. Sopi pa.tipakkami. Itaraa paccuttaritvaa saa.taka.m nivaasetvaa ta.m upasa"nkamitvaa ‘ki.m, bhante’ti pucchi. So tamattha.m aarocesi. Saa bahuuhi kaara.nehi gharaavaase aadiinava.m brahmacariyavaase aanisa.msa~nca dassetvaa ovadamaanaapi ^a^V0.0279^ea^ tassa ukka.n.tha.m vinodetu.m asakkontii ‘aya.m mama kaara.naa evaruupaaya iddhiyaa parihiino; na daani yutta.m pariccajitu’nti. ‘Idheva ti.t.thaa’ti vatvaa ghara.m gantvaa maataapituuna.m ta.m pavatti.m aarocesi. Tepi aagantvaa naanappakaara.m ovadamaanaa vacana.m agga.nhanta.m aaha.msu – ‘‘tva.m amhe uccaakulaati maa sallakkhesi. Maya.m pesakaaraa. Sakkhissasi pesakaarakamma.m kaatu’’nti? Saama.nero aaha – ‘‘upaasaka, gihiibhuuto naama pesakaarakamma.m vaa kareyya na.lakaarakamma.m vaa, ki.m iminaa, maa saa.takamatte lobha.m karothaa’’ti ^a^P0.0295^ea^. Pesakaarako udare baddhasaa.taka.m datvaa ghara.m netvaa dhiitara.m adaasi.

[03]So pesakaarakamma.m ugga.nhitvaa pesakaarehi saddhi.m saalaaya kamma.m karoti. A~n~nesa.m itthiyo paatova bhatta.m sampaadetvaa aahari.msu. Tassa bhariyaa na taava aagacchati. So itaresu kamma.m vissajjetvaa bhu~njamaanesu tasara.m va.t.tento nisiidi. Saa pacchaa aagamaasi. Atha na.m so ‘aticirena aagataasii’ti tajjesi. Maatugaamo ca naama api cakkavattiraajaana.m attani pa.tibaddhacitta.m ~natvaa daasa.m viya sallakkheti. Tasmaa saa evamaaha – ‘‘a~n~nesa.m ghare daarupa.n.nalo.naadiini sannihitaani; baahirato aaharitvaa daayakaa pesakaarakaapi atthi. Aha.m pana ekikaa; tvampi ‘mayha.m ghare ida.m atthi, ida.m natthii’ti na jaanaasi. Sace icchasi bhu~nja, no ce icchasi maa bhu~njaa’’ti. So ‘na kevala.m ussuure bhatta.m aaharasi, vaacaayapi ma.m gha.t.tesii’ti kujjhitvaa a~n~na.m pahara.na.m apassanto tameva tasarada.n.daka.m tasarato lu~ncitvaa khipi. Saa ta.m aagacchanta.m disvaa iisaka.m parivatti. Tasarada.n.dakassa ca ko.ti naama tikhi.naa hoti. Saa tassaa parivattamaanaaya akkhiko.tiya.m pavisitvaa a.t.thaasi. Saa ubhohi hatthehi vegena akkhi.m aggahesi. Bhinna.t.thaanato lohita.m paggharati.

[03]So ^a^M0.0282^ea^ tasmi.m kaale upajjhaayassa vacana.m anussari ‘ida.m sandhaaya ma.m upajjhaayo ‘‘anaagate kaale kaa.napesakaariyaa hatthena maddita.m ka~njiya.m pivissasii’’ti aaha. Ida.m therena di.t.tha.m bhavissati. Aho diighadassii ayyo’ti mahaasaddena roditu.m aarabhi. Tamena.m a~n~ne ‘‘ala.m, aavuso, maa rodi; akkhi naama bhinna.m na sakkaa rodanena pa.tipaakatika.m kaatu’’nti aaha.msu. So ‘‘naaha.m etamattha.m rodaami; apica kho ida.m sandhaaya rodaamii’’ti sabba.m pavatti.m pa.tipaa.tiyaa kathesi. Eva.m uppannaa samathavipassanaa nirujjhamaanaa anatthaaya sa.mvattanti.

[03]Aparampi ^a^V0.0280^ea^ vatthu – ti.msamattaa bhikkhuu kalyaa.niya.m mahaacetiya.m vanditvaa a.tavimaggena mahaamagga.m otaramaanaa antaraamagge jhaamakkhette kamma.m katvaa aagacchanta.m eka.m manussa.m addasa.msu. Tassa sariira.m masimakkhita.m hoti, masimakkhitameva ca eka.m kaasaava.m kaccha.m pii.letvaa nivattha.m. Olokiyamaano jhaamakhaa.nuko viya khaayati. So divasabhaage ^a^P0.0296^ea^ kamma.m katvaa upa.d.dhajhaayamaanaana.m daaruuna.m kalaapa.m ukkhipitvaa pi.t.thiya.m vippaki.n.nehi kesehi kummaggena aagantvaa bhikkhuuna.m sammukhe a.t.thaasi. Saama.neraa disvaa a~n~nama~n~na.m olokayamaanaa ‘‘aavuso, tuyha.m pitaa, tuyha.m mahaapitaa, tuyha.m maatulo’’ti hasamaanaa gantvaa ‘‘ko naamosi tva.m, upaasakaa’’ti naama.m pucchi.msu. So naama.m pucchito vippa.tisaarii hutvaa daarukalaapa.m cha.d.detvaa vattha.m sa.mvidhaaya nivaasetvaa mahaathere vanditvaa ‘‘ti.t.thatha taava, bhante’’ti aaha. Mahaatheraa a.t.tha.msu.

[03]Daharasaama.neraa aagantvaa mahaatheraana.m sammukhaapi parihaasa.m karonti. Upaasako aaha – ‘‘bhante, tumhe ma.m passitvaa parihasatha; ettakeneva matthaka.m pattamhaati sallakkhetha. Ahampi pubbe tumhaadisova sama.no ahosi.m. Tumhaaka.m pana cittekaggataamattampi natthi. Aha.m imasmi.m saasane mahiddhiko mahaanubhaavo ahosi.m; aakaasa.m gahetvaa pathavi.m karomi, pathavi.m aakaasa.m; duura.m ga.nhitvaa santika.m karomi, santika.m duura.m; cakkavaa.lasahassa.m kha.nena vinivijjhaami. Hatthe me passatha; idaani pana makka.tahatthasadisaa. Aha.m imeheva hatthehi idha nisinnova candimasuuriye paraamasi.m. Imesa.myeva paadaana.m candimasuuriye paadakathalika.m katvaa nisiidi.m. Evaruupaa me iddhi pamaadena antarahitaa. Tumhe maa pamajjittha. Pamaadena hi evaruupa.m ^a^M0.0283^ea^ byasana.m paapu.nanti. Appamattaa viharantaa jaatijaraamara.nassa anta.m karonti. Tasmaa tumhe ma~n~neva aaramma.na.m karitvaa appamattaa hotha, bhante’’ti tajjetvaa ovaadamadaasi. Te tassa kathentasseva sa.mvega.m aapajjitvaa vipassamaanaa ti.msa janaa tattheva arahatta.m paapu.ni.msuuti. Evampi uppannaa samathavipassanaa nirujjhamaanaa anatthaaya sa.mvattantiiti veditabbaa. Aya.m taava lokiyasammappadhaanakathaaya vinicchayo.

[03]Lokuttaramaggakkha.ne paneta.m ekameva viiriya.m catukiccasaadhanavasena cattaari naamaani labhati. Tattha ^b^anuppannaana^eb^nti asamudaacaaravasena vaa ananubhuutaaramma.navasena vaa anuppannaana.m; a~n~nathaa hi anamatagge sa.msaare anuppannaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa naama natthi. Anuppannaa pana uppajjamaanaapi eteyeva uppajjanti ^a^P0.0297^ea^, pahiiyamaanaapi eteyeva pahiiyanti.

[03]Tattha ^a^V0.0281^ea^ ekaccassa vattavasena kilesaa na samudaacaranti. Ekaccassa ganthadhuta"ngasamaadhivipassanaa navakammikaana.m a~n~nataravasena. Katha.m? Ekacco hi vattasampanno hoti. Tassa dvaasiitikhuddakavattaani (cuu.lava. 243 aadayo), cuddasa mahaavattaani (cuu.lava. 356 aadayo), cetiya"nga.nabodhiya"nga.napaaniiyamaa.lauposathaagaaraaagantukagamikavattaani ca karontasseva kilesaa okaasa.m na labhanti; aparabhaage panassa vatta.m vissajjetvaa bhinnavattassa vicarato ayonisomanasikaara~nceva sativossagga~nca aagamma uppajjanti. Eva.m asamudaacaaravasena anuppannaa uppajjanti naama.

[03]Ekacco ganthayutto hoti; ekampi nikaaya.m ga.nhaati, dvepi, tayopi, cattaaropi, pa~ncapi. Tasseva tepi.taka.m buddhavacana.m atthavasena paa.livasena anusandhivasena pubbaaparavasena ga.nhantassa sajjhaayantassa cintentassa vaacentassa desentassa pakaasentassa kilesaa okaasa.m na labhanti; aparabhaage panassa ganthakamma.m pahaaya kusiitassa vicarato ayonisomanasikaarasativossagge aagamma uppajjanti. Evampi asamudaacaaravasena anuppannaa uppajjanti naama.

[03]Ekacco pana dhuta"ngadharo hoti, terasa dhuta"ngagu.ne samaadaaya vattati. Tassa dhuta"ngagu.ne pariharantassa kilesaa okaasa.m na labhanti; aparabhaage ^a^M0.0284^ea^ panassa dhuta"ngaani vissajjetvaa baahullaaya aava.t.tassa vicarato ayonisomanasikaarasativossagge aagamma uppajjanti. Evampi asamudaacaaravasena anuppannaa uppajjanti naama.

[03]Ekacco pana a.t.thasu samaapattiisu ci.n.navasii hoti. Tassa pa.thamajjhaanaadiisu aavajjanavasiiaadiina.m vasena viharantassa kilesaa okaasa.m na labhanti; aparabhaage panassa parihiinajjhaanassa vaa vissa.t.thajjhaanassa vaa bhassaadiisu anuyuttassa viharato ayonisomanasikaarasativossagge aagamma uppajjanti. Evampi asamudaacaaravasena anuppannaa kilesaa uppajjanti naama.

[03]Ekacco pana vipassako hoti; sattasu vaa vipassanaasu a.t.thaarasasu ^a^P0.0298^ea^ vaa mahaavipassanaasu kamma.m karonto viharati. Tasseva.m viharato kilesaa okaasa.m na labhanti; aparabhaage panassa vipassanaakamma.m pahaaya kaayada.lhiibahulassa viharato ayonisomanasikaarasativossagge ^a^V0.0282^ea^ aagamma uppajjanti. Evampi asamudaacaaravasena anuppannaa kilesaa uppajjanti naama.

[03]Ekacco pana navakammiko hoti, uposathaagaarabhojanasaalaadiini karoti. Tassa tesa.m upakara.naani cintentassa kilesaa okaasa.m na labhanti; aparabhaage panassa navakamme ni.t.thite vaa vissa.t.the vaa ayonisomanasikaarasativossagge aagamma uppajjanti. Evampi asamudaacaaravasena anuppannaa kilesaa uppajjanti naama.

[03]Ekacco pana brahmalokaa aagato suddhasatto hoti. Tassa anaasevanaaya kilesaa okaasa.m na labhanti; aparabhaage panassa laddhaasevanassa ayonisomanasikaarasativossagge aagamma uppajjanti. Evampi asamudaacaaravasena anuppannaa kilesaa uppajjanti naama. Eva.m taava asamucaaravasena anuppannataa veditabbaa.

[03]Katha.m ananubhuutaaramma.navasena? Idhekacco ananubhuutapubba.m manaapiyaadibheda.m aaramma.na.m labhati. Tassa tattha ayonisomanasikaarasativossagge aagamma raagaadayo kilesaa uppajjanti. Eva.m ananubhuutaaramma.navasena ^a^M0.0285^ea^ anuppannaa uppajjanti naama. Lokuttaramaggakkha.ne pana ekameva viiriya.m.

[03]Ye ca eva.m anuppannaa uppajjeyyu.m, te yathaa neva uppajjanti, eva.m nesa.m anuppaadakicca.m uppannaana~nca pahaanakicca.m saadheti. Tasmaa ^b^uppannaana.m paapakaana^eb^nti ettha pana catubbidha.m uppanna.m – vattamaanuppanna.m, bhutvaa vigatuppanna.m, okaasakatuppanna.m, bhuumiladdhuppannanti. Tattha ye kilesaa vijjamaanaa uppaadaadisama"ngino – ida.m ^b^vattamaanuppanna.m^eb^ naama. Kamme pana javite aaramma.narasa.m anubhavitvaa niruddhavipaako bhutvaa vigata.m naama. Kamma.m uppajjitvaa niruddha.m bhutvaa vigata.m naama. Tadubhayampi ^b^bhutvaa vigatuppanna^eb^nti sa"nkha.m gacchati. Kusalaakusalakamma.m a~n~nassa kammassa vipaaka.m pa.tibaahitvaa attano vipaakassa okaasa.m karoti. Eva.m ^a^P0.0299^ea^ kate okaase vipaako uppajjamaano okaasakara.nato pa.t.thaaya uppannoti vuccati. Ida.m ^b^okaasakatuppanna.m^eb^ naama.

[03]Pa~ncakkhandhaa ^a^V0.0283^ea^ pana vipassanaaya bhuumi naama. Te atiitaadibhedaa honti. Tesu anusayitakilesaa pana atiitaa vaa anaagataa vaa paccuppannaa vaati na vattabbaa. Atiitakkhandhesu anusayitaapi hi appahiinaava honti. Anaagatakkhandhesu, paccuppannakkhandhesu anusayitaapi appahiinaava honti. Ida.m ^b^bhuumiladdhuppanna.m^eb^ naama. Tenaahu poraa.naa – ‘‘taasu taasu bhuumiisu asamugghaatitaa kilesaa bhuumiladdhuppannaati sa"nkha.m gacchantii’’ti.

[03]Aparampi catubbidha.m uppanna.m – samudaacaaruppanna.m, aaramma.naadhigahituppanna.m, avikkhambhituppanna.m, asamugdhaatituppannanti. Tattha sampati vattamaana.myeva ^b^‘samudaacaaruppanna.m’^eb^ naama. Saki.m cakkhuuni ummiiletvaa aaramma.ne nimitte gahite anussaritaanussaritakkha.ne kilesaa nuppajjissantiiti na vattabbaa. Kasmaa? AAramma.nassa adhigahitattaa. Yathaa ki.m? Yathaa khiirarukkhassa ku.thaariyaa aahataahata.t.thaane khiira.m na nikkhamissatiiti na vattabba.m, eva.m. Ida.m ^b^‘aaramma.naadhigahituppanna.m’^eb^ naama. Samaapattiyaa avikkhambhitakilesaa pana imasmi.m naama .thaane nuppajjissantiiti na vattabbaa. Kasmaa? Avikkhambhitattaa. Yathaa ki.m? Yathaa sace khiirarukkha.m ku.thaariyaa aahaneyyu.m, ‘imasmi.m naama .thaane khiira.m na nikkhameyyaa’ti ^a^M0.0286^ea^ na vattabba.m, eva.m. Ida.m ^b^‘avikkhambhituppanna.m’^eb^ naama. Maggena asamugghaatitakilesaa pana bhavagge nibbattassaapi nuppajjissantiiti purimanayeneva vitthaaretabba.m. Ida.m ^b^‘asamugghaatituppanna.m’^eb^ naama.

[03]Imesu uppannesu vattamaanuppanna.m, bhutvaavigatuppanna.m, okaasakatuppanna.m, samudaacaaruppannanti catubbidha.m uppanna.m na maggavajjha.m; bhuumiladdhuppanna.m, aaramma.naadhiggahituppanna.m, avikkhambhituppanna.m, asamugghaatituppannanti catubbidha.m maggavajjha.m. Maggo hi uppajjamaano ete kilese pajahati. So ye kilese pajahati, te atiitaa vaa anaagataa vaa paccuppannaa vaati na vattabbaa. Vuttampi ceta.m –

[08]‘‘Ha~nci atiite kilese pajahati, tena hi khii.na.m khepeti, niruddha.m ^a^P0.0300^ea^ nirodheti, vigata.m vigameti, attha"ngata.m attha.m gameti, atiita.m ya.m natthi ta.m pajahati. Ha~nci anaagate kilese pajahati, tena hi ajaata.m pajahati, anibbatta.m anuppanna.m apaatubhuuta.m pajahati, anaagata.m ya.m natthi ta.m pajahati. Ha~nci paccuppanne kilese pajahati, tena hi ratto raaga.m pajahati, du.t.tho dosa.m, muu.lho moha.m, vinibaddho maana.m, paraama.t.tho di.t.thi.m, vikkhepagato ^a^V0.0284^ea^ uddhacca.m, ani.t.tha"ngato vicikiccha.m, thaamagato anusaya.m pajahati; ka.nhasukkadhammaa yuganaddhaa samameva vattanti; sa.mkilesikaa maggabhaavanaa hoti…pe… tena hi natthi maggabhaavanaa, natthi phalasacchikiriyaa, natthi kilesappahaana.m, natthi dhammaabhisamayo’ti. ‘Atthi maggabhaavanaa…pe… atthi dhammaabhisamayo’ti. Yathaa katha.m viya? Seyyathaapi taru.no rukkho…pe… apaatubhuutaaneva na paatubhavanti’’ti (pa.ti. ma. 3.21).

[03]Iti paa.liya.m ajaataphalarukkho aagato; jaataphalarukkhena pana diipetabba.m. Yathaa hi saphalo taru.naambarukkho. Tassa phalaani manussaa paribhu~njeyyu.m, sesaani paatetvaa pacchiyo puureyyu.m. Atha~n~no puriso ta.m pharasunaa chindeyya. Tenassa neva atiitaani phalaani naasitaani honti, na anaagatapaccuppannaani ca naasitaani; atiitaani hi manussehi paribhuttaani, anaagataani anibbattaani na sakkaa naasetu.m ^a^M0.0287^ea^. Yasmi.m pana samaye so chinno tadaa phalaaniyeva natthiiti paccuppannaanipi anaasitaani. Sace pana rukkho acchinno assa, athassa pathaviirasa~nca aaporasa~nca aagamma yaani phalaani nibbatteyyu.m, taani naasitaani honti. Taani hi ajaataaneva na jaayanti, anibbattaaneva na nibbattanti, apaatubhuutaaneva na paatubhavanti. Evameva maggo naapi atiitaadibhede kilese pajahati, naapi na pajahati. Yesa~nhi kilesaana.m maggena khandhesu apari~n~naatesu uppatti siyaa, maggena uppajjitvaa khandhaana.m pari~n~naatattaa te kilesaa ajaataava na jaayanti, anibbattaava na nibbattanti, apaatubhuutaava na paatubhavanti. Taru.naputtaaya itthiyaa puna avijaayanattha.m byaadhitaana.m ^a^P0.0301^ea^ rogavuupasamattha.m piitabhesajjehi caapi ayamattho vibhaavetabbo. Eva.m maggo ye kilese pajahati, te atiitaa vaa anaagataa vaa paccuppannaa vaati na vattabbaa. Na ca maggo kilese na pajahati. Ye pana maggo kilese pajahati, te sandhaaya ‘uppannaana.m paapakaana’ntiaadi vutta.m.

[03]Na kevala~nca maggo kileseyeva pajahati, kilesaana.m pana appahiinattaa ye uppajjeyyu.m upaadinnakkhandhaa, tepi pajahatiyeva. Vuttampi ceta.m ‘‘sotaapattimagga~naa.nena abhisa"nkhaaravi~n~naa.nassa nirodhena satta bhave .thapetvaa anamatagge sa.msaare ye uppajjeyyu.m naama~nca ruupa~nca etthete nirujjhantii’’ti (cuu.lani. ajitamaa.navapucchaaniddesa 6) vitthaaro. Iti maggo upaadinnato anupaadinnato ca vu.t.thaati. Bhavavasena pana sotaapattimaggo apaayabhavato vu.t.thaati ^a^V0.0285^ea^. Sakadaagaamimaggo sugatibhavekadesato; anaagaamimaggo sugatikaamabhavato; vu.t.thaati arahattamaggo ruupaaruupabhavato vu.t.thaati, sabbabhavehi vu.t.thaatiyevaatipi vadanti.

[03]Atha maggakkha.ne katha.m anuppannaana.m uppaadaaya bhaavanaa hoti? Katha.m vaa uppannaana.m .thitiyaati? Maggappavattiyaa eva. Maggo hi pavattamaano pubbe anuppannapubbattaa anuppanno naama vuccati. Anaagatapubba~nhi .thaana.m gantvaa ananubhuutapubba.m vaa aaramma.na.m anubhavitvaa vattaaro bhavanti – ‘anaagata.t.thaana.m aagatamha, ananubhuuta.m aaramma.na.m anubhavaamaa’ti. Yaa cassa pavatti, ayameva .thiti naamaati .thitiyaa bhaavetiiti vattu.m va.t.tati. Evametassa bhikkhuno ida.m lokuttaramaggakkha.ne viiriya.m ‘‘anuppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m anuppaadaayaa’’tiaadiini ^a^M0.0288^ea^ cattaari naamaani labhati. Aya.m lokuttaramaggakkha.ne sammappadhaanakathaa. Evamettha lokiyalokuttaramissakaa sammappadhaanaa niddi.t.thaati.
[06]Suttantabhaajaniiyava.n.nanaa.

[03]^b^408^eb^^b^.^eb^ Abhidhammabhaajaniiye sabbaanipi sammappadhaanaani dhammasa"nga.niya.m vibhattassa desanaanayassa mukhamattameva dassentena niddi.t.thaani. Tattha nayabhedo veditabbo. Katha.m? Pa.thamasammappadhaane ^a^P0.0302^ea^ taava sotaapattimagge jhaanaabhinivese suddhikapa.tipadaa, suddhikasu~n~nataa, su~n~natapa.tipadaa, suddhikaappa.nihitaa, appa.nihitapa.tipadaati imesu pa~ncasu .thaanesu dvinna.m dvinna.m catukkapa~ncakanayaana.m vasena dasa nayaa honti. Eva.m sesesupiiti viisatiyaa abhinivesesu dve nayasataani. Taani catuuhi adhipatiihi catuggu.nitaani a.t.tha. Iti suddhikaani dve saadhipatiini a.t.thaati sabbampi nayasahassa.m hoti. Tathaadutiyasammappadhaanaadiisu suddhikasammappadhaane caati sotaapattimagge pa~ncanayasahassaani. Yathaa ca sotaapattimagge, eva.m sesamaggesupiiti kusalavaseneva viisati nayasahassaani. Vipaake pana sammappadhaanehi kattabbakicca.m ^a^V0.0286^ea^ natthiiti vipaakavaaro na gahitoti. Sammappadhaanaani panettha nibbattitalokuttaraaneva kathitaaniiti veditabbaani.
[06]Abhidhammabhaajaniiyava.n.nanaa.

[03]^b^427^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pa~nhaapucchake paa.lianusaareneva sammappadhaanaana.m kusalaadibhaavo veditabbo. AAramma.nattikesu pana sabbaanipi etaani appamaa.na.m nibbaana.m aarabbha pavattito appamaa.naaramma.naaneva, na maggaaramma.naani; sahajaatahetuvasena pana maggahetukaani; viima.msa.m je.t.thaka.m katvaa maggabhaavanaakaale ^a^M0.0289^ea^ maggaadhipatiini; chandacittaje.t.thikaaya maggabhaavanaaya na vattabbaani maggaadhipatiiniiti; viiriyaje.t.thikaaya pana a~n~nassa viiriyassa abhaavaa na vattabbaani maggaadhipatiiniiti vaa na maggaadhipatiiniiti vaa; atiitaadiisu ekaaramma.nabhaavenapi na vattabbaani; nibbaanassa pana bahiddhaadhammattaa bahiddhaaramma.naani naama hontiiti. Evametasmi.m pa~nhaapucchake nibbattitalokuttaraaneva sammappadhaanaani kathitaani. Sammaasambuddhena hi suttantabhaajaniiyasmi.myeva lokiyalokuttaramissakaa sammappadhaanaa kathitaa; abhidhammabhaajaniiyapa~nhaapucchakesu pana lokuttaraayevaati. Evamaya.m sammappadhaanavibha"ngopi tepariva.t.ta.m niiharitvaava bhaajetvaa dassitoti.
[06]Sammohavinodaniyaa vibha"nga.t.thakathaaya
[06]Sammappadhaanavibha"ngava.n.nanaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03]^b^431^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idaani ^a^P0.0303^ea^^a^M0.0290^ea^^a^V0.0287^ea^ tadanantare iddhipaadavibha"nge ^b^cattaaro^eb^ti ga.nanaparicchedo. ^b^Iddhipaadaa^eb^ti ettha ijjhatiiti iddhi, samijjhati nipphajjatiiti attho. Ijjhanti vaa etaaya sattaa iddhaa vuddhaa ukka.msagataa hontiitipi iddhi. Pa.thamenatthena iddhi eva paado iddhipaado, iddhiko.t.thaasoti attho. Dutiyenatthena iddhiyaa paadoti iddhipaado; paadoti pati.t.thaa, adhigamupaayoti attho. Tena hi yasmaa uparuuparivisesasa"nkhaata.m iddhi.m pajjanti paapu.nanti, tasmaa paadoti vuccati. Eva.m taava ‘‘cattaaro iddhipaadaa’’ti ettha attho veditabbo.

[03]Idaani te bhaajetvaa dassetu.m ^b^idha bhikkhuu^eb^tiaadi aaraddha.m. Tattha ^b^idha bhikkhuu^eb^ti imasmi.m saasane bhikkhu. ^b^Chandasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata^eb^nti ettha chandahetuko chandaadhiko vaa samaadhi ^b^chandasamaadhi^eb^. Kattukamyataachanda.m adhipati.m karitvaa pa.tiladdhasamaadhisseta.m adhivacana.m. Padhaanabhuutaa sa"nkhaaraa ^b^padhaanasa"nkhaaraa^eb^. Catukiccasaadhakassa sammappadhaanaviiriyasseta.m adhivacana.m. ^b^Samannaagata^eb^nti chandasamaadhinaa ca padhaanasa"nkhaarehi ca upeta.m. ^b^Iddhipaada^eb^nti nipphattipariyaayena vaa ijjhanaka.t.thena ijjhanti etaaya sattaa iddhaa vuddhaa ukka.msagataa hontiiti iminaa vaa pariyaayena iddhiiti sa"nkha.m gataana.m upacaarajjhaanaadikusalacittasampayuttaana.m chandasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaaraana.m adhi.t.thaana.t.thena paadabhuuta.m sesacittacetasikaraasinti attho. Ya~nhi parato ‘‘iddhipaadoti tathaabhuutassa vedanaakkhandho…pe… vi~n~naa.nakkhandho’’ti vutta.m, ta.m iminaa atthena yujjati. Iminaa nayena sesesupi attho veditabbo. Yatheva hi chanda.m adhipati.m karitvaa pa.tiladdhasamaadhi ^a^P0.0304^ea^ chandasamaadhiiti ^a^V0.0288^ea^ vutto, eva.m viiriya.m…pe… citta.m. Viima.msa.m adhipati.m karitvaa pa.tiladdhasamaadhi viima.msasamaadhiiti vuccati.

[03]Idaani chandasamaadhiaadiini padaani bhaajetvaa dassetu.m ^b^katha~nca bhikkhuu^eb^tiaadi aaraddha.m. Tattha ^b^chanda~nce bhikkhu adhipati.m karitvaa^eb^ti yadi bhikkhu chanda.m adhipati.m chanda.m je.t.thaka.m chanda.m dhura.m chanda.m pubba"ngama.m katvaa samaadhi.m pa.tilabhati nibbatteti, eva.m nibbattito aya.m samaadhi chandasamaadhi naama vuccatiiti attho. ^b^Viiriya~nce^eb^tiaadiisupi ^a^M0.0291^ea^ eseva nayo. ^b^Ime vuccanti padhaanasa"nkhaaraa^eb^ti ettaavataa chandiddhipaada.m bhaavayamaanassa bhikkhuno padhaanaabhisa"nkhaarasa"nkhaatacatukiccasaadhaka.m viiriya.m kathita.m. ^b^Tadekajjha.m abhisa~n~nuuhitvaa^eb^ti ta.m sabba.m ekato raasi.m katvaati attho. ^b^Sa"nkhya.m gacchatii^eb^ti eta.m vohaara.m gacchatiiti veditabbanti attho.
[03]^b^433^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idaani ‘‘chandasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaaro’’ti etasmi.m padasamuuhe chandaadidhamme bhaajetvaa dassetu.m ^b^tattha katamo chando^eb^tiaadi aaraddha.m. Ta.m uttaanatthameva.

[03]^b^Upeto hotii^eb^ti iddhipaadasa"nkhaato dhammaraasi upeto hoti. ^b^Tesa.m dhammaana^eb^nti tesa.m sampayuttaana.m chandaadidhammaana.m. ^b^Iddhi samiddhii^eb^tiaadiini sabbaani nipphattivevacanaaneva. Eva.m santepi ijjhanaka.t.thena ^b^iddhi^eb^. Sampu.n.naa iddhi ^b^samiddhi;^eb^ upasaggena vaa pada.m va.d.dhita.m. Ijjhanaakaaro ^b^ijjhanaa^eb^. ^b^Samijjhanaa^eb^ti upasaggena pada.m va.d.dhita.m. Attano santaane paatubhaavavasena labhana.m ^b^laabho^eb^. Parihiinaanampi viiriyaarambhavasena puna laabho ^b^pa.tilaabho;^eb^ upasaggena vaa pada.m va.d.dhita.m. ^b^Pattii^eb^ti adhigamo. Aparihaanavasena sammaa pattiiti ^b^sampatti. Phusanaa^eb^ti pa.tilaabhaphusanaa. ^b^Sacchikiriyaa^eb^ti ^a^P0.0305^ea^ pa.tilaabhasacchikiriyaava. ^b^Upasampadaa^eb^ti pa.tilaabhaupasampadaa evaati veditabbaa.

[03]^b^Tayaabhuutassaa^eb^ti tena aakaarena bhuutassa; te chandaadidhamme pa.tilabhitvaa .thitassaati attho. ^b^Vedanaakkhandho^eb^tiaadiihi chandaadayo anto katvaa cattaaropi khandhaa kathitaa. ^b^Te dhamme^eb^ti te cattaaro aruupakkhandhe; chandaadayo vaa tayo dhammetipi vutta.m. ^b^AAsevatii^eb^tiaadiini vuttatthaaneva. Sesaiddhipaadaniddesesupi iminaava nayena attho veditabbo.

[03]Ettaavataa ^a^V0.0289^ea^ ki.m kathitanti? Catunna.m bhikkhuuna.m matthakappatta.m kamma.t.thaana.m kathita.m. Eko hi bhikkhu chanda.m avassayati; kattukamyataakusaladhammacchandena atthanipphattiya.m sati ‘aha.m lokuttaradhamma.m nibbattessaami, natthi mayha.m etassa nibbattane bhaaro’ti chanda.m je.t.thaka.m chanda.m dhura.m chanda.m pubba"ngama.m katvaa lokuttaradhamma.m nibbatteti. Eko viiriya.m avassayati. Eko citta.m, eko pa~n~na.m avassayati. Pa~n~naaya atthanipphattiya.m sati ‘aha.m lokuttaradhamma.m nibbattessaami ^a^M0.0292^ea^, natthi mayha.m etassa nibbattane bhaaro’ti pa~n~na.m je.t.thaka.m pa~n~na.m dhura.m pa~n~na.m pubba"ngama.m katvaa lokuttaradhamma.m nibbatteti.

[03]Katha.m? Yathaa hi catuusu amaccaputtesu .thaanantara.m patthetvaa vicarantesu eko upa.t.thaana.m avassayi, eko suurabhaava.m, eko jaati.m, eko manta.m. Katha.m? Tesu hi pa.thamo ‘upa.t.thaane appamaadakaaritaaya atthanipphattiyaa sati labbhamaana.m lacchaameta.m .thaanantara’nti upa.t.thaana.m avassayi. Dutiyo ‘upa.t.thaane appamattopi ekacco sa"ngaame paccupa.t.thite sa.n.thaatu.m na sakkoti; avassa.m kho pana ra~n~no paccanto kuppissati; tasmi.m kuppite rathadhure kamma.m katvaa raajaana.m aaraadhetvaa aaharaapessaameta.m .thaanantara’nti suurabhaava.m avassayi. Tatiyo ‘suurabhaavepi sati ekacco hiinajaatiko hoti; jaati.m sodhetvaa .thaanantara.m dadantaa mayha.m dassantii’ti jaati.m avassayi. Catuttho ‘jaatimaapi eko amantaniiyo hoti; mantena kattabbakicce uppanne aaharaapessaameta.m .thaanantara’nti manta.m ^a^P0.0306^ea^ avassayi. Te sabbepi attano attano avassayabalena .thaanantaraani paapu.ni.msu.

[03]Tattha upa.t.thaane appamatto hutvaa .thaanantara.m patto viya chanda.m avassaaya kattukamyataakusaladhammacchandena atthanibbattiya.m sati ‘aha.m lokuttaradhamma.m nibbattessaami, natthi mayha.m etassa nibbattane bhaaro’ti chanda.m je.t.thaka.m chanda.m dhura.m chanda.m pubba"ngama.m katvaa lokuttaradhammanibbattako da.t.thabbo, ra.t.thapaalatthero (ma. ni. 2.293 aadayo) viya. So hi aayasmaa chanda.m dhura.m katvaa lokuttaradhamma.m nibbattesi. Suurabhaavena raajaana.m aaraadhetvaa .thaanantara.m patto viya viiriya.m je.t.thaka.m viiriya.m dhura.m viiriya.m pubba"ngama.m katvaa lokuttaradhammanibbattako da.t.thabbo, so.natthero (mahaava. 243) viya. So hi aayasmaa viiriya.m dhura.m katvaa lokuttaradhamma.m nibbattesi.

[03]Jaatisampattiyaa ^a^V0.0290^ea^ .thaanantara.m patto viya citta.m je.t.thaka.m citta.m dhura.m citta.m pubba"ngama.m katvaa lokuttaradhammanibbattako da.t.thabbo, sambhuutatthero viya. So hi aayasmaa citta.m dhura.m katvaa lokuttaradhamma.m nibbattesi. Manta.m avassaaya .thaanantarappatto viya viima.msa.m je.t.thaka.m viima.msa.m dhura.m viima.msa.m pubba"ngama.m katvaa ^a^M0.0293^ea^ lokuttaradhammanibbattako da.t.thabbo, thero mogharaajaa viya. So hi aayasmaa viima.msa.m dhura.m katvaa lokuttaradhamma.m nibbattesi.

[03]Ettha ca tayo chandasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasa"nkhaataa dhammaa iddhiipi honti iddhipaadaapi. Sesaa pana sampayuttakaa cattaaro khandhaa iddhipaadaayeva. Viiriyacittaviima.msasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasa"nkhaataapi tayo dhammaa iddhiipi honti iddhipaadaapi. Sesaa pana sampayuttakaa cattaaro khandhaa iddhipaadaayeva. Aya.m taava abhedato kathaa.

[03]Bhedato pana ‘chando’ iddhi naama. Chandadhurena bhaavitaa cattaaro khandhaa chandiddhipaado naama. Samaadhi padhaanasa"nkhaaroti dve dhammaa sa"nkhaarakkhandhavasena chandiddhipaade pavisanti; paade pavi.t.thaatipi vattu.m va.t.tatiyeva. Tattheva ‘samaadhi’ iddhi naama. Samaadhidhurena bhaavitaa cattaaro khandhaa samaadhiddhipaado naama. Chando ^a^P0.0307^ea^ padhaanasa"nkhaaroti dve dhammaa sa"nkhaarakkhandhavasena samaadhiddhipaade pavisanti; paade pavi.t.thaatipi vattu.m va.t.tati eva. Tattheva ‘padhaanasa"nkhaaro’ iddhi naama. Padhaanasa"nkhaarabhaavitaa cattaaro khandhaa padhaanasa"nkhaariddhipaado naama. Chando samaadhiiti dve dhammaa sa"nkhaarakkhandhavasena padhaanasa"nkhaariddhipaade pavisanti; paade pavi.t.thaatipi vattu.m va.t.tati eva. Tattheva ‘viiriya.m’ iddhi naama, ‘citta.m’ iddhi naama, ‘viima.msaa’ iddhi naama…pe… paade pavi.t.thaatipi vattu.m va.t.tati eva. Aya.m bhedato kathaa naama.

[03]Ettha pana abhinava.m natthi; gahitameva vibhuutadhaatuka.m kata.m. Katha.m? Chando, samaadhi, padhaanasa"nkhaaroti ime tayo dhammaa iddhiipi honti iddhipaadaapi. Sesaa sampayuttakaa cattaaro khandhaa iddhipaadaayeva. Ime hi tayo dhammaa ijjhamaanaa sampayuttakehi catuuhi khandhehi saddhi.myeva ijjhanti, na vinaa. Sampayuttakaa pana cattaaro khandhaa ijjhanaka.t.thena iddhi naama honti, pati.t.thaana.t.thena paado naama. ‘Iddhii’ti vaa ‘iddhipaado’ti vaa na a~n~nassa kassaci adhivacana.m, sampayuttakaana.m catunna.m khandhaana.myeva adhivacana.m. Viiriya.m, citta.m, viima.msaasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaaroti tayo dhammaa…pe… catunna.m khandhaana.myeva adhivacana.m.

[03]Apica ^a^V0.0291^ea^ pubbabhaago pubbabhaago iddhipaado naama; pa.tilaabho pa.tilaabho iddhi naamaati veditabbo. Ayamattho upacaarena vaa vipassanaaya vaa diipetabbo. Pa.thamajjhaanaparikamma~nhi iddhipaado naama, pa.thamajjhaana.m iddhi naama. Dutiyatatiyacatutthaaakaasaana~ncaayatana, vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanaaaki~nca~n~naayatananevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanaparikamma.m ^a^M0.0294^ea^ iddhipaado naama, nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m iddhi naama. Sotaapattimaggassa vipassanaa iddhipaado naama, sotaapattimaggo iddhi naama. Sakadaagaami, anaagaami, arahattamaggassa vipassanaa iddhipaado naama, arahattamaggo iddhi naama. Pa.tilaabhenaapi diipetu.m va.t.tatiyeva. Pa.thamajjhaana~nhi iddhipaado naama, dutiyajjhaana.m iddhi naama; dutiyajjhaana.m iddhipaado naama, tatiyajjhaana.m iddhi naama…pe… anaagaamimaggo iddhipaado naama, arahattamaggo iddhi naama.

[03]Kena.t.thena ^a^P0.0308^ea^ iddhi? Kena.t.thena paadoti? Ijjhanaka.t.theneva iddhi. Pati.t.thaana.t.theneva paado. Evamidhaapi iddhiiti vaa paadoti vaa na a~n~nassa kassaci adhivacana.m, sampayuttakaana.m catunna.m khandhaana.myeva adhivacananti. Eva.m vutte pana idamaaha.msu – catunna.m khandhaanameva adhivacana.m bhaveyya, yadi satthaa parato uttaracuu.labhaajaniiya.m naama na aahareyya. Uttaracuu.labhaajaniiye pana ‘‘chandoyeva chandiddhipaado, viiriyameva, cittameva, viima.msaava viima.msiddhipaado’’ti kathita.m. Keci pana ‘‘iddhi naama anipphannaa, iddhipaado nipphanno’’ti vadi.msu. Tesa.m vacana.m pa.tikkhipitvaa iddhiipi iddhipaadopi ‘nipphanno tilakkha.nabbhaahato’ti sanni.t.thaana.m kata.m. Iti imasmi.m suttantabhaajaniiye lokiyalokuttaramissakaa iddhipaadaa kathitaati.
[06]Suttantabhaajaniiyava.n.nanaa.

[03]^b^444^eb^^b^.^eb^ Abhidhammabhaajaniiya.m uttaanatthameva. Nayaa panettha ga.netabbaa. ‘‘Chandasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaavetii’’ti vutta.t.thaanasmi~nhi lokuttaraani cattaari nayasahassaani vibhattaani. Viiriyasamaadhiaadiisupi eseva nayo. Tathaa uttaracuu.labhaajaniiye chandiddhipaade ^a^V0.0292^ea^ cattaari nayasahassaani vibhattaani, viiriyacittaviima.msiddhipaade cattaari cattaariiti sabbaanipi a.t.thanna.m catukkaana.m vasena dvatti.msa nayasahassaani vibhattaani. Evameta.m nibbattitalokuttaraana.myeva iddhipaadaana.m vasena dvatti.msanayasahassappa.tima.n.dita.m abhidhammabhaajaniiya.m kathitanti veditabba.m.

[03]^b^462^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pa~nhaapucchake ^a^M0.0295^ea^ paa.lianusaareneva iddhipaadaana.m kusalaadibhaavo veditabbo. AAramma.nattikesu pana sabbepete appamaa.na.m nibbaana.m aarabbha pavattito appamaa.naaramma.naa eva, na maggaaramma.naa; sahajaatahetuvasena pana maggahetukaa, na maggaadhipatino. Cattaaro hi adhipatayo a~n~nama~n~na.m garu.m na karonti. Kasmaa? Saya.m je.t.thakattaa. Yathaa hi samajaatikaa samavayaa samathaamaa samasippaa cattaaro raajaputtaa attano attano je.t.thakataaya a~n~nama~n~nassa ^a^P0.0309^ea^ apaciti.m na karonti, evamimepi cattaaro adhipatayo paa.tiyekka.m paa.tiyekka.m je.t.thakadhammataaya a~n~nama~n~na.m garu.m na karontiiti ekanteneva na maggaadhipatino. Atiitaadiisu ekaaramma.nabhaavepi na vattabbaa. Nibbaanassa pana bahiddhaadhammattaa bahiddhaaramma.naa naama hontiiti. Evametasmi.m pa~nhaapucchake nibbattitalokuttaraava iddhipaadaa kathitaa. Sammaasambuddhena hi suttantabhaajaniiyasmi.myeva lokiyalokuttaramissakaa iddhipaadaa kathitaa, abhidhammabhaajaniiyapa~nhaapucchakesu pana lokuttaraayevaati. Evamaya.m iddhipaadavibha"ngopi tepariva.t.ta.m niiharitvaava dassitoti.
[06]Sammohavinodaniyaa vibha"nga.t.thakathaaya
[06]Iddhipaadavibha"ngava.n.nanaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03]^b^466^eb^. Idāni ^a^P0.0310^ea^^a^M0.0296^ea^^a^V0.0293^ea^ tadanantare bojjhaṅgavibhaṅge ^b^sattā^eb^ti gaṇanaparicchedo. ^b^Bojjhaṅgā^eb^ti bodhiyā bodhissa vā aṅgāti ^b^bojjhaṅgā^eb^. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yā esā dhammasāmaggī yāya lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe uppajjamānāya līnuddhaccapatiṭṭhānāyūhanakāmasukhattakilamathānuyogaucchedasassatābhinivesādīnaṃ anekesaṃ upaddavānaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtāya satidhammavicayavīriyapītipassaddhisamādhiupekkhāsaṅkhātāya dhammasāmaggiyā ariyasāvako bujjhatīti katvā bodhīti vuccati, bujjhati kilesasantānaniddāya uṭṭhahati, cattāri vā ariyasaccāni paṭivijjhati, nibbānameva vā sacchikaroti, tassā dhammasāmaggīsaṅkhātāya bodhiyā aṅgātipi ^b^bojjhaṅgā,^eb^ jhānaṅgamaggaṅgādīni viya. Yo panesa yathāvuttappakārāya etāya dhammasāmaggiyā bujjhatīti katvā ariyasāvako bodhīti vuccati, tassa bodhissa aṅgātipi ^b^bojjhaṅgā,^eb^ senaṅgarathaṅgādayo viya. Tenāhu aṭṭhakathācariyā – ‘‘bujjhanakassa puggalassa aṅgāti vā bojjhaṅgā’’ti.

[03]Apica ‘‘bojjhaṅgāti kenaṭṭhena bojjhaṅgā? Bodhāya saṃvattantīti bojjhaṅgā, bujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā, anubujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā, paṭibujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā, sambujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā’’ti iminā paṭisambhidānayenāpi bojjhaṅgattho veditabbo.

[03]^b^Satisambojjhaṅgo^eb^tiādīsu pasattho sundaro ca bojjhaṅgo sambojjhaṅgo, satiyeva sambojjhaṅgo ^b^satisambojjhaṅgo^eb^. Tattha upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇo satisambojjhaṅgo, pavicayalakkhaṇo dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo, paggahalakkhaṇo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo, pharaṇalakkhaṇo pītisambojjhaṅgo, upasamalakkhaṇo ^a^V0.0294^ea^ passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, avikkhepalakkhaṇo samādhisambojjhaṅgo, paṭisaṅkhānalakkhaṇo ^a^P0.0311^ea^ upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo. Tesu ‘‘satiñca khvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sabbatthikaṃ vadāmī’’ti (saṃ. ni. 5.234) vacanato sabbesaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ upakārakattā satisambojjhaṅgo paṭhamaṃ vutto. Tato paraṃ ‘‘so tathā sato viharanto ^a^M0.0297^ea^ taṃ dhammaṃ paññāya pavicinatī’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 150) nayena evaṃ anukkameneva nikkhepapayojanaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgatameva.

[03]Kasmā panete satteva vuttā, anūnā anadhikāti? Līnuddhaccapaṭipakkhato sabbatthikato ca. Ettha hi tayo bojjhaṅgā līnassa paṭipakkhā, yathāha – ‘‘yasmiñca kho, bhikkhave, samaye līnaṃ cittaṃ hoti, kālo tasmiṃ samaye dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya, kālo vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya, kālo pītisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāyā’’ti (saṃ. ni. 5.234). Tayo uddhaccassa paṭipakkhā, yathāha – ‘‘yasmiñca kho, bhikkhave, samaye uddhataṃ cittaṃ hoti, kālo tasmiṃ samaye passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya, kālo samādhisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya, kālo upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāyā’’ti (saṃ. ni. 5.234). Eko panettha loṇadhūpanaṃ viya sabbabyañjanesu, sabbakammikaamacco viya ca sabbesu rājakiccesu, sabbabojjhaṅgesu icchitabbato sabbatthiko, yathāha – ‘‘satiñca khvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sabbatthikaṃ vadāmī’’ti. ‘‘Sabbatthaka’’ntipi pāḷi. Dvinnampi sabbattha icchitabbanti attho. Evaṃ līnuddhaccapaṭipakkhato sabbatthikato ca satteva vuttāti veditabbā.

[03]^b^467^eb^. Idāni nesaṃ ekasmiṃyevārammaṇe attano attano kiccavasena nānākaraṇaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^tattha katamo satisambojjhaṅgo^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha ^b^idha bhikkhū^eb^ti imasmiṃ sāsane bhikkhu. ^b^Satimā hotī^eb^ti paññāya paññavā, yasena yasavā, dhanena dhanavā viya satiyā satimā hoti, satisampannoti attho. ^b^Paramenā^eb^ti uttamena; tañhi paramatthasaccassa nibbānassa ceva maggassa ca anulomato paramaṃ nāma hoti uttamaṃ seṭṭhaṃ. ^b^Satinepakkenā^eb^ti nepakkaṃ vuccati paññā; satiyā ceva nepakkena ^a^P0.0312^ea^ cāti attho.

[03]Kasmā pana imasmiṃ satibhājanīye paññā saṅgahitāti? Satiyā balavabhāvadīpanatthaṃ. Sati hi paññāya saddhimpi uppajjati vināpi, paññāya saddhiṃ uppajjamānā balavatī hoti, vinā uppajjamānā dubbalā. Tenassā balavabhāvadīpanatthaṃ paññā saṅgahitā. Yathā hi dvīsu ^a^V0.0295^ea^ disāsu dve rājamahāmattā tiṭṭheyyuṃ; tesu eko rājaputtaṃ gahetvā tiṭṭheyya, eko attano dhammatāya ekakova tesu rājaputtaṃ gahetvā ṭhito attanopi ^a^M0.0298^ea^ tejena rājaputtassapi tejena tejavā hoti; attano dhammatāya ṭhito na tena samatejo hoti; evameva rājaputtaṃ gahetvā ṭhitamahāmatto viya paññāya saddhiṃ uppannā sati, attano dhammatāya ṭhito viya vinā paññāya uppannā. Tattha yathā rājaputtaṃ gahetvā ṭhito attanopi tejena rājaputtassapi tejena tejavā hoti, evaṃ paññāya saddhiṃ uppannā sati balavatī hoti; yathā attano dhammatāya ṭhito na tena samatejo hoti, evaṃ vinā paññāya uppannā dubbalā hotīti balavabhāvadīpanatthaṃ paññā gahitāti.

[03]^b^Cirakatampī^eb^ti attano vā parassa vā kāyena cirakataṃ vattaṃ vā kasiṇamaṇḍalaṃ vā kasiṇaparikammaṃ vā. ^b^Cirabhāsitampī^eb^ti attanā vā parena vā vācāya cirabhāsitaṃ bahukampi, vattasīse ṭhatvā dhammakathaṃ vā kammaṭṭhānavinicchayaṃ vā, vimuttāyatanasīse vā ṭhatvā dhammakathameva. ^b^Saritā hotī^eb^ti taṃ kāyaviññattiṃ vacīviññattiñca samuṭṭhāpetvā pavattaṃ arūpadhammakoṭṭhāsaṃ ‘evaṃ uppajjitvā evaṃ niruddho’ti saritā hoti. ^b^Anussaritā^eb^ti punappunaṃ saritā. ^b^Ayaṃ vuccati satisambojjhaṅgo^eb^ti ayaṃ evaṃ uppannā sesabojjhaṅgasamuṭṭhāpikā vipassanāsampayuttā sati satisambojjhaṅgo nāma kathīyati.

[03]^b^So tathā sato viharanto^eb^ti so bhikkhu tenākārena uppannāya satiyā sato hutvā viharanto. ^b^Taṃ dhamma^eb^nti taṃ cirakataṃ cirabhāsitaṃ heṭṭhā vuttappakāraṃ dhammaṃ. ^b^Paññāya pavicinatī^eb^ti paññāya ‘aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā’ti pavicinati. ^b^Pavicaratī^eb^ti ^a^P0.0313^ea^ ‘aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā’ti tattha paññaṃ carāpento pavicarati. ^b^Parivīmaṃsaṃ āpajjatī^eb^ti olokanaṃ gavesanaṃ āpajjati. ^b^Ayaṃ vuccatī^eb^ti idaṃ vuttappakāraṃ bojjhaṅgasamuṭṭhāpakaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo nāma vuccati.

[03]^b^Tassa taṃ dhamma^eb^nti tassa bhikkhuno taṃ heṭṭhā vuttappakāraṃ dhammaṃ. ^b^Āraddhaṃ hotī^eb^ti paripuṇṇaṃ hoti paggahitaṃ. ^b^Asallīna^eb^nti āraddhattāyeva asallīnaṃ. ^b^Ayaṃ vuccatī^eb^ti idaṃ bojjhaṅgasamuṭṭhāpakaṃ vipassanāsampayuttaṃ vīriyaṃ vīriyasambojjhaṅgo nāma vuccati.

[03]^b^Nirāmisā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0299^ea^^a^V0.0296^ea^ kāmāmisalokāmisavaṭṭāmisānaṃ abhāvena nirāmisā parisuddhā. ^b^Ayaṃ vuccatī^eb^ti ayaṃ bojjhaṅgasamuṭṭhāpikā vipassanāsampayuttā pīti pītisambojjhaṅgo nāma vuccati.

[03]^b^Pītimanassā^eb^ti pītisampayuttacittassa. ^b^Kāyopi passambhatī^eb^ti khandhattayasaṅkhāto nāmakāyo kilesadarathapaṭippassaddhiyā passambhati. ^b^Cittampī^eb^ti viññāṇakkhandhopi tatheva passambhati. ^b^Ayaṃ vuccatī^eb^ti ayaṃ bojjhaṅgasamuṭṭhāpikā vipassanāsampayuttā passaddhi passaddhisambojjhaṅgo nāma vuccati.

[03]^b^Passaddhakāyassa sukhino^eb^ti passaddhakāyatāya uppannasukhena sukhitassa. ^b^Samādhiyatī^eb^ti sammā ādhiyati, niccalaṃ hutvā ārammaṇe ṭhapīyati, appanāppattaṃ viya hoti. ^b^Ayaṃ vuccatī^eb^ti ayaṃ bojjhaṅgasamuṭṭhāpikā vipassanāsampayuttā cittekaggatā samādhisambojjhaṅgo nāma vuccati.

[03]^b^Tathā samāhita^eb^nti tena appanāppattena viya samādhinā samāhitaṃ. ^b^Sādhukaṃ ajjhupekkhitā hotī^eb^ti suṭṭhu ajjhupekkhitā hoti; tesaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānavaḍḍhane abyāvaṭo hutvā ajjhupekkhati. ^b^Ayaṃ^eb^^a^P0.0314^ea^^b^vuccatī^eb^ti ayaṃ channaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ anosakkanaanativattanabhāvasādhako majjhattākāro upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo nāma vuccati.
[03]Ettāvatā kiṃ kathitaṃ nāma hoti? Apubbaṃ acarimaṃ ekacittakkhaṇe nānārasalakkhaṇā pubbabhāgavipassanā bojjhaṅgā kathitā hontīti.
[06]Paṭhamo nayo.

[03]^a^para468-469^ea^^b^468-469^eb^. Idāni yena pariyāyena satta bojjhaṅgā cuddasa honti, tassa pakāsanatthaṃ dutiyanayaṃ dassento puna ^b^satta bojjhaṅgā^eb^tiādimāha. Tatrāyaṃ anupubbapadavaṇṇanā – ^b^ajjhattaṃ dhammesu satī^eb^ti ajjhattikasaṅkhāre pariggaṇhantassa uppannā sati. ^b^Bahiddhā dhammesu satī^eb^ti bahiddhāsaṅkhāre pariggaṇhantassa uppannā sati. ^b^Yadapī^eb^ti yāpi. ^b^Tadapī^eb^ti sāpi. ^b^Abhiññāyā^eb^ti abhiññeyyadhamme abhijānanatthāya. ^b^Sambodhāyā^eb^ti sambodhi vuccati maggo, maggatthāyāti attho. ^b^Nibbānāyā^eb^ti ^a^V0.0297^ea^ vānaṃ vuccati taṇhā; sā tattha ^a^M0.0300^ea^ natthīti nibbānaṃ, tadatthāya, asaṅkhatāya amatadhātuyā sacchikiriyatthāya saṃvattatīti attho. ^b^Dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgepi^eb^ eseva nayo.

[03]^b^Kāyikaṃ vīriya^eb^nti caṅkamaṃ adhiṭṭhahantassa uppannavīriyaṃ. ^b^Cetasikaṃ vīriya^eb^nti ‘‘na tāvāhaṃ imaṃ pallaṅkaṃ bhindissāmi yāva me na anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccissatī’’ti evaṃ kāyapayogaṃ vinā uppannavīriyaṃ. ^b^Kāyapassaddhī^eb^ti tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ darathapassaddhi. ^b^Cittapassaddhī^eb^ti viññāṇakkhandhassa darathapassaddhi. Upekkhāsambojjhaṅge satisambojjhaṅgasadisova vinicchayo. Imasmiṃ naye satta bojjhaṅgā lokiyalokuttaramissakā kathitā.

[03]Porāṇakattherā pana ‘ettakena pākaṭaṃ na hotī’ti vibhajitvā dassesuṃ. Etesu hi ajjhattadhammesu sati pavicayo upekkhāti ime tayo attano khandhārammaṇattā lokiyāva honti. Tathā maggaṃ appattaṃ kāyikavīriyaṃ. Avitakkaavicārā ^a^P0.0315^ea^ pana pītisamādhiyo lokuttarā honti. Sesā lokiyalokuttaramissakāti.

[03]Tattha ajjhattaṃ tāva dhammesu satipavicayaupekkhā ajjhattārammaṇā, lokuttarā pana bahiddhārammaṇāti tesaṃ lokuttarabhāvo mā yujjittha. Caṅkamappayogena nibbattavīriyampi lokiyanti vadanto na kilamati. Avitakkaavicārā pana pītisamādhiyo kadā lokuttarā hontīti? Kāmāvacare tāva pītisambojjhaṅgo labbhati, avitakkaavicārā pīti na labbhati. Rūpāvacare avitakkaavicārā pīti labbhati, pītisambojjhaṅgo pana na labbhati. Arūpāvacare sabbena sabbaṃ na labbhati. Ettha pana alabbhamānakaṃ upādāya labbhamānakāpi paṭikkhittā. Evamayaṃ avitakkaavicāro pītisambojjhaṅgo kāmāvacaratopi nikkhanto rūpāvacaratopi arūpāvacaratopīti nibbattitalokuttaro yevāti kathito.

[03]Tathā kāmāvacare samādhisambojjhaṅgo labbhati, avitakkaavicāro pana samādhi na labbhati. Rūpāvacaraarūpāvacaresu avitakkaavicāro samādhi labbhati, samādhisambojjhaṅgo pana na labbhati. Ettha pana alabbhamānakaṃ upādāya labbhamānakopi paṭikkhitto. Evamayaṃ avitakkaavicāro samādhi kāmāvacaratopi nikkhanto rūpāvacaratopi arūpāvacaratopīti nibbattitalokuttaro yevāti kathito.

[03]Apica ^a^M0.0301^ea^^a^V0.0298^ea^ lokiyaṃ gahetvā lokuttaro kātabbo; lokuttaraṃ gahetvā lokiyo kātabbo. Ajjhattadhammesu hi satipavicayaupekkhānaṃ lokuttarabhāvanākālopi atthi. Tatridaṃ suttaṃ – ‘‘ajjhattavimokkhaṃ khvāhaṃ, āvuso, sabbupādānakkhayaṃ vadāmi; evamassime āsavā nānusentī’’ti (saṃ. ni. 2.32 thokaṃ visadisaṃ) iminā suttena lokuttarā honti. Yadā pana caṅkamapayogena nibbatte kāyikavīriye anupasanteyeva vipassanā maggena ghaṭīyati, tadā taṃ lokuttaraṃ hoti. Ye pana therā ‘‘kasiṇajjhāne, ānāpānajjhāne, brahmavihārajjhāne ca bojjhaṅgo uddharanto na vāretabbo’’ti vadanti, tesaṃ vāde avitakkaavicārā pītisamādhisambojjhaṅgā lokiyā hontīti.
[06]Dutiyo nayo.

[03]^a^para470-471^ea^^b^470-471^eb^. Idāni ^a^P0.0316^ea^ bojjhaṅgānaṃ bhāvanāvasena pavattaṃ tatiyanayaṃ dassento puna ^b^satta bojjhaṅgā^eb^tiādimāha. Tatthāpi ayaṃ anupubbapadavaṇṇanā – ^b^bhāvetī^eb^ti vaḍḍheti; attano santāne punappunaṃ janeti abhinibbatteti. ^b^Vivekanissita^eb^nti viveke nissitaṃ. ^b^Viveko^eb^ti vivittatā. So cāyaṃ tadaṅgaviveko, vikkhambhanasamucchedapaṭippassaddhinissaraṇavivekoti pañcavidho. Tattha tadaṅgaviveko nāma vipassanā. Vikkhambhanaviveko nāma aṭṭha samāpattiyo. Samucchedaviveko nāma maggo. Paṭippassaddhiviveko nāma phalaṃ. Nissaraṇaviveko nāma sabbanimittanissaṭaṃ nibbānaṃ. Evametasmiṃ pañcavidhe viveke nissitaṃ vivekanissitanti tadaṅgavivekanissitaṃ samucchedavivekanissitaṃ nissaraṇavivekanissitañca satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāvetīti ayamattho veditabbo.

[03]Tathā hi ayaṃ satisambojjhaṅgabhāvanānuyogamanuyutto yogī vipassanākkhaṇe kiccato tadaṅgavivekanissitaṃ, ajjhāsayato nissaraṇavivekanissitaṃ, maggakāle pana kiccato samucchedavivekanissitaṃ, ārammaṇato nissaraṇavivekanissitaṃ, satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti. Pañcavivekanissitampīti eke. Te hi na kevalaṃ balavavipassanāmaggaphalakkhaṇesu eva bojjhaṅgaṃ uddharanti, vipassanāpādakakasiṇajjhānaānāpānāsubhabrahmavihārajjhānesupi uddharanti, na ca paṭisiddhā aṭṭhakathācariyehi ^a^M0.0302^ea^. Tasmā tesaṃ matena etesaṃ jhānānaṃ pavattikkhaṇe kiccato eva vikkhambhanavivekanissitaṃ. Yathā ca vipassanākkhaṇe ‘‘ajjhāsayato nissaraṇavivekanissita’’nti ^a^V0.0299^ea^ vuttaṃ, evaṃ ‘‘paṭippassaddhivivekanissitampi bhāvetī’’ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Esa nayo virāganissitādīsu. Vivekatthā eva hi virāgādayo.

[03]Kevalañcettha vossaggo duvidho – pariccāgavossaggo ca pakkhandanavossaggo cāti. Tattha ^b^‘pariccāgavossaggo’^eb^ti vipassanākkhaṇe ca tadaṅgavasena maggakkhaṇe ca samucchedavasena kilesappahānaṃ. ^b^‘Pakkhandanavossaggo’^eb^ti vipassanākkhaṇe tanninnabhāvena, maggakkhaṇe pana ārammaṇakaraṇena nibbānapakkhandanaṃ. Tadubhayampi imasmiṃ lokiyalokuttaramissake ^a^P0.0317^ea^ atthavaṇṇanānaye vaṭṭati. Tathā hi ayaṃ sati sambojjhaṅgo yathāvuttena pakārena kilese pariccajati, nibbānañca pakkhandati.

[03]^b^Vossaggapariṇāmi^eb^nti iminā pana sakalena vacanena vossaggatthaṃ pariṇamantaṃ pariṇatañca, paripaccantaṃ paripakkañcāti idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti. Ayañhi bojjhaṅgabhāvanamanuyutto bhikkhu yathā satisambojjhaṅgo kilesapariccāgavossaggatthaṃ nibbānapakkhandanavossaggatthañca paripaccati, yathā ca paripakko hoti, tathā naṃ bhāvetīti. Esa nayo sesabojjhaṅgesupi. Imasmimpi naye lokiyalokuttaramissakā bojjhaṅgā kathitāti.
[06]Suttantabhājanīyavaṇṇanā.
[03]^b^472^eb^. Abhidhammabhājanīye sattapi bojjhaṅge ekato pucchitvā vissajjanassa ca pāṭiyekkaṃ pucchitvā vissajjanassa ca vasena dve nayā. Tesaṃ atthavaṇṇanā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbā.

[03]Upekkhāsambojjhaṅganiddese pana upekkhanavasena ^b^upekkhā^eb^. Upekkhanākāro ^b^upekkhanā^eb^. Upekkhitabbayutte samappavatte dhamme ikkhati, na codetīti ^a^M0.0303^ea^^b^upekkhā^eb^. Puggalaṃ upekkhāpetīti upekkhanā ^a^V0.0300^ea^. Bojjhaṅgabhāvappattiyā lokiyaupekkhanāya adhikā upekkhanā ^b^ajjhupekkhanā^eb^. Abyāpārāpajjanena majjhattabhāvo majjhattatā. Sā pana cittassa, na sattassāti dīpetuṃ ^b^majjhattatā cittassā^eb^ti vuttanti. Ayamettha anupubbapadavaṇṇanā.

[03]Nayā panettha gaṇetabbā – sattannampi hi bojjhaṅgānaṃ ekato pucchitvā vissajjane ekekamagge nayasahassaṃ nayasahassanti cattāri nayasahassāni vibhattāni. Pāṭiyekkaṃ pucchitvā vissajjane ekekabojjhaṅgavasena cattāri cattārīti satta catukkā aṭṭhavīsati. Tāni purimehi catūhi saddhiṃ dvattiṃsāti sabbānipi abhidhammabhājanīye dvattiṃsa nayasahassāni vibhattāni kusalāneva. Yasmā pana phalakkhaṇepi bojjhaṅgā labbhanti, kusalahetukāni ca sāmaññaphalāni, tasmā tesupi bojjhaṅgadassanatthaṃ kusalaniddesapubbaṅgamāya eva tantiyā vipākanayo āraddho. Sopi ^a^P0.0318^ea^ ekato pucchitvā vissajjanassa ca, pāṭiyekkaṃ pucchitvā vissajjanassa ca vasena duvidho hoti. Sesamettha heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Vipāke pana kusalato tiguṇā nayā kātabbāti.
[06]Abhidhammabhājanīyavaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^482^eb^. Pañhāpucchake pāḷianusāreneva bojjhaṅgānaṃ kusalādibhāvo veditabbo. Ārammaṇattikesu pana sabbepete appamāṇaṃ nibbānaṃ ārabbha pavattito appamāṇārammaṇā eva, na maggārammaṇā. Sahajātahetuvasena panettha kusalā maggahetukā, vīriyaṃ vā vīmaṃsaṃ vā jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā maggabhāvanākāle maggādhipatino, chandacittajeṭṭhikāya maggabhāvanāya na vattabbā maggādhipatinoti, phalakālepi na vattabbā eva.

[03]Atītādīsu ekārammaṇabhāvenapi na vattabbā, nibbānassa pana bahiddhādhammattā bahiddhārammaṇā nāma hontīti. Evametasmiṃ pañhāpucchakepi nibbattitalokuttarāva ^a^M0.0304^ea^ bojjhaṅgā kathitā ^a^V0.0301^ea^. Sammāsambuddhena hi suttantabhājanīyasseva paṭhamanayasmiṃ lokiyā, dutiyatatiyesu lokiyalokuttaramissakā bojjhaṅgā kathitā. Abhidhammabhājanīyassa pana catūsupi nayesu imasmiñca pañhāpucchake lokuttarāyevāti evamayaṃ bojjhaṅgavibhaṅgopi teparivaṭṭaṃ nīharitvāva bhājetvā dassitoti.
[06]Sammohavinodaniyā vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāya
[06]Bojjhaṅgavibhaṅgavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^486^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idaani ^a^P0.0319^ea^^a^M0.0305^ea^^a^V0.0302^ea^ tadanantare maggavibha"nge ^b^ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo^eb^tiaadi sabba.m saccavibha"nge dukkhanirodhagaaminiipa.tipadaaniddese vuttanayeneva veditabba.m. Bhaavanaavasena paa.tiyekka.m dassite dutiyanayepi ^b^sammaadi.t.thi.m bhaaveti vivekanissita^eb^ntiaadi sabba.m bojjha"ngavibha"nge vuttanayeneva veditabba.m. Evamida.m dvinnampi nayaana.m vasena suttantabhaajaniiya.m lokiyalokuttaramissakameva kathita.m.

[03]^b^490^eb^^b^.^eb^ Abhidhammabhaajaniiye ‘ariyo’ti avatvaa ^b^a.t.tha"ngiko maggo^eb^ti vutta.m. Eva.m avuttepi aya.m ariyo eva. Yathaa hi muddhaabhisittassa ra~n~no muddhaabhisittaaya deviyaa kucchismi.m jaato putto raajaputtoti avuttepi raajaputtoyeva hoti, evamayampi ariyoti avuttepi ariyo evaati veditabbo. Sesamidhaapi saccavibha"nge vuttanayeneva veditabba.m.

[03]^b^493^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pa~nca"ngikavaarepi a.t.tha"ngikoti avuttepi a.t.tha"ngiko eva veditabbo. Lokuttaramaggo hi pa~nca"ngiko naama natthi. Ayamettha aacariyaana.m samaanatthakathaa. Vita.n.davaadii panaaha – ‘‘lokuttaramaggo a.t.tha"ngiko naama natthi, pa~nca"ngikoyeva hotii’’ti. So ‘‘sutta.m aaharaahii’’ti vutto addhaa a~n~na.m apassanto ima.m mahaasa.laayatanato suttappadesa.m aaharissati ‘‘yaa tathaabhuutassa di.t.thi, saassa hoti sammaadi.t.thi. Yo tathaabhuutassa sa"nkappo, vaayaamo, sati, yo ^a^V0.0303^ea^ tathaabhuutassa samaadhi, svaassa hoti sammaasamaadhi. Pubbeva kho panassa kaayakamma.m vaciikamma.m aajiivo suparisuddho hotii’’ti.

[03]Tato ‘‘etassa anantara.m suttapada.m aaharaa’’ti vattabbo. Sace aaharati icceta.m kusala.m, no ce aaharati saya.m aaharitvaa ‘‘evamassaaya.m ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo bhaavanaapaaripuuri.m gacchatii’’ti (ma. ni. 3.431) ‘‘iminaa ^a^P0.0320^ea^^a^M0.0306^ea^ te satthusaasanena vaado bhinno; lokuttaramaggo pa~nca"ngiko naama natthi, a.t.tha"ngikova hotii’’ti vattabbo.

[03]Imaani pana tii.ni a"ngaani pubbe parisuddhaani vattanti, lokuttaramaggakkha.ne parisuddhataraani honti. Atha ‘pa~nca"ngiko maggo’ti ida.m kimattha.m gahitanti? Atirekakiccadassanattha.m. Yasmi~nhi samaye micchaavaaca.m pajahati, sammaavaaca.m puureti, tasmi.m samaye sammaakammantasammaaaajiivaa natthi. Imaani pa~ncakaaraapaka"ngaaneva micchaavaaca.m pajahanti; sammaavaacaa pana saya.m virativasena puureti. Yasmi.m samaye micchaakammanta.m pajahati, sammaakammanta.m puureti, tasmi.m samaye sammaavaacaasammaaaajiivaa natthi. Imaani pa~nca kaaraapaka"ngaaneva micchaakammanta.m pajahanti; sammaakammanto pana saya.m virativasena puureti. Yasmi.m samaye micchaaaajiiva.m pajahati, sammaaaajiiva.m puureti, tasmi.m samaye sammaavaacaasammaakammantaa natthi. Imaani pa~nca kaaraapaka"ngaaneva micchaaaajiiva.m pajahanti; sammaaaajiivo pana saya.m virativasena puureti. Ima.m etesa.m pa~ncanna.m kaaraapaka"ngaana.m kiccaatirekata.m dassetu.m pa~nca"ngiko maggoti gahita.m. Lokuttaramaggo pana a.t.tha"ngikova hoti, pa~nca"ngiko naama natthi.

[03]‘‘Yadi sammaavaacaadiihi saddhi.m a.t.tha"ngikoti vadatha, catasso sammaavaacaacetanaa, tisso sammaakammantacetanaa, satta sammaaaajiivacetanaati imamhaa cetanaabahuttaa katha.m muccissatha? Tasmaa pa~nca"ngikova lokuttaramaggo’’ti. ‘‘Cetanaabahuttaa ca pamuccissaama; a.t.tha"ngikova lokuttaramaggoti ca vakkhaama’’. ‘‘Tva.m taava mahaacattaariisakabhaa.nako hosi, na hosii’’ti pucchitabbo. Sace ‘‘na homii’’ti vadati, ‘‘tva.m abhaa.nakattaa na jaanaasii’’ti vattabbo. Sace ‘‘bhaa.nakosmii’’ti vadati, ‘‘sutta.m aaharaa’’ti vattabbo. Sace sutta.m aaharati icceta.m kusala.m, no ce aaharati saya.m uparipa.n.naasato aaharitabba.m –

[08]‘‘Katamaa ^a^V0.0304^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, sammaavaacaa? Sammaavaaca.mpaha.m, bhikkhave, dvaaya.m vadaami – atthi, bhikkhave, sammaavaacaa saasavaa pu~n~nabhaagiyaa upadhivepakkaa; atthi, bhikkhave, sammaavaacaa ariyaa anaasavaa lokuttaraa magga"ngaa.

[08]‘‘Katamaa ca, bhikkhave, sammaavaacaa saasavaa ^a^P0.0321^ea^ pu~n~nabhaagiyaa upadhivepakkaa? Musaavaadaa verama.nii, pisu.naaya vaacaaya verama.nii, pharusaaya ^a^M0.0307^ea^ vaacaaya verama.nii, samphappalaapaa verama.nii – aya.m, bhikkhave, sammaavaacaa saasavaa pu~n~nabhaagiyaa upadhivepakkaa.

[08]‘‘Katamaa ca, bhikkhave, sammaavaacaa ariyaa anaasavaa lokuttaraa magga"ngaa? Yaa kho, bhikkhave, ariyacittassa anaasavacittassa ariyamaggasama"ngino ariyamagga.m bhaavayato catuuhi vaciiduccaritehi aarati virati pa.tivirati verama.nii – aya.m, bhikkhave, sammaavaacaa ariyaa anaasavaa lokuttaraa magga"ngaa…pe….
[08]‘‘Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammaakammanto? Sammaakammanta.mpaha.m, bhikkhave, dvaya.m vadaami…pe… upadhivepakko.
[08]‘‘Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammaakammanto ariyo anaasavo lokuttaro…pe….
[08]‘‘Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammaaaajiivo? Sammaaaajiiva.mpaha.m, bhikkhave, dvaaya.m vadaami…pe… upadhivepakko.

[08]‘‘Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammaaaajiivo ariyo anaasavo lokuttaro magga"ngo? Yaa kho, bhikkhave, ariyacittassa anaasavacittassa ariyamaggasama"ngino ariyamagga.m bhaavayato micchaaaajiivaa aarati virati pa.tivirati verama.nii – aya.m, bhikkhave, sammaaaajiivo ariyo anaasavo lokuttaro magga"ngo’’ti (ma. ni. 3.138 aadayo).

[03]Evamettha ^a^V0.0305^ea^ catuuhi vaciiduccaritehi, tiihi kaayaduccaritehi, micchaajiivato caati ekekaava virati ariyaa anaasavaa lokuttaraa magga"ngaati vuttaa. ‘‘Kuto ettha cetanaabahutta.m? Kuto pa~nca"ngiko maggo? Ida.m te sutta.m akaamakassa lokuttaramaggo a.t.tha"ngikoti diipeti’’. Sace ettakena sallakkheti icceta.m kusala.m, no ce sallakkheti a~n~naanipi kaara.naani aaharitvaa sa~n~naapetabbo. Vutta~nheta.m bhagavataa –

[08]‘‘Yasmi.m kho, subhadda, dhammavinaye ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo na upalabbhati, sama.nopi tattha na upalabbhati…pe… imasmi.m kho, subhadda, dhammavinaye ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo upalabbhati; idheva ^a^M0.0308^ea^, subhadda, sama.no…pe… su~n~naa parappavaadaa sama.nehi a~n~nehiiti (dii. ni. 2.214).
[03]A~n~nesupi anekesu suttasatesu a.t.tha"ngikova maggo aagato. Kathaavatthuppakara.nepi vutta.m –
[21]‘‘Maggaana.m a.t.tha"ngiko se.t.tho, saccaana.m caturo padaa;
[22]Viraago se.t.tho dhammaana.m, dvipadaana~nca cakkhumaa’’ti (kathaa. 872) –

[03]‘‘Attheva ^a^P0.0322^ea^ suttantoti’’? ‘‘AAmantaa’’‘‘tena hi a.t.tha"ngiko maggo’’ti. Sace pana ettakenaapi sa~n~natti.m na gacchati, ‘‘gaccha, vihaara.m pavisitvaa yaagu.m pivaahii’’ti uyyojetabbo. Uttarimpana kaara.na.m vakkhatiiti a.t.thaanameta.m. Sesamettha uttaanatthameva.

[03]Nayaa panettha ga.netabbaa. A.t.tha"ngikamaggasmi~nhi ekato pucchitvaa ekato vissajjane catuusu maggesu cattaari nayasahassaani vibhattaani. Pa~nca"ngikamagge ekato pucchitvaa ekato vissajjane cattaari; paa.tiyekka.m pucchitvaa paa.tiyekka.m vissajjane cattaari cattaariiti pa~ncasu a"ngesu viisati. Iti purimaani a.t.tha imaani ca viisatiiti sabbaanipi maggavibha"nge a.t.thaviisati nayasahassaani vibhattaani. Taani ca kho nibbattitalokuttaraani kusalaaneva. Vipaake pana kusalato tigu.naa nayaa kaatabbaati.
[06]Abhidhammabhaajaniiyava.n.nanaa.

[03]^b^504^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pa~nhaapucchake ^a^V0.0306^ea^ paa.lianusaareneva magga"ngaana.m kusalaadibhaavo veditabbo. AAramma.nattikesu pana sabbaanipetaani appamaa.na.m nibbaana.m aarabbha pavattito appamaa.naaramma.naaneva, na maggaaramma.naani. Neva hi maggo na phala.m magga.m aaramma.na.m karoti. Sahajaatahetuvasena panettha kusalaani maggahetukaani; viiriya.m vaa viima.msa.m vaa je.t.thaka.m katvaa maggabhaavanaakaale maggaadhipatiini; chandacittaje.t.thikaaya maggabhaavanaaya na vattabbaani maggaadhipatiiniiti; phalakaalepi na vattabbaaneva.

[03]Atiitaadiisu ^a^M0.0309^ea^ ekaaramma.nabhaavenapi na vattabbaani; nibbaanassa pana bahiddhaadhammattaa bahiddhaaramma.naani naama hontiiti evametasmi.m pa~nhaapucchakepi nibbattitalokuttaraaneva magga"ngaani kathitaani. Sammaasambuddhena hi suttantabhaajaniiyasmi.myeva lokiyalokuttaraani magga"ngaani kathitaani; abhidhammabhaajaniiye pana pa~nhaapucchake ca lokuttaraanevaati evamaya.m maggavibha"ngopi tepariva.t.ta.m niiharitvaava bhaajetvaa dassitoti.
[06]Sammohavinodaniyaa vibha"nga.t.thakathaaya
[06]Magga"ngavibha"ngava.n.nanaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03]^b^508^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idaani ^a^P0.0323^ea^^a^M0.0310^ea^^a^V0.0307^ea^ tadanantare jhaanavibha"nge yaa taava aya.m sakalassaapi suttantabhaajaniiyassa pa.thama.m maatikaa .thapitaa, tattha ^b^idhaa^eb^ti vacana.m pubbabhaagakara.niiyasampadaaya sampannassa sabbappakaarajjhaananibbattakassa puggalassa sannissayabhuutasaasanaparidiipana.m, a~n~nasaasanassa ca tathaabhaavapa.tisedhana.m. Vutta~nheta.m – ‘‘idheva, bhikkhave, sama.no…pe… su~n~naa parappavaadaa sama.nehi a~n~nehii’’ti (a. ni. 4.241). ^b^Bhikkhuu^eb^ti tesa.m jhaanaana.m nibbattakapuggalaparidiipana.m. ^b^Paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto^eb^ti idamassa paatimokkhasa.mvare pati.t.thitabhaavaparidiipana.m. ^b^Viharatii^eb^ti idamassa tadanuruupavihaarasama"ngiibhaavaparidiipana.m. ^b^AAcaaragocarasampanno^eb^ti idamassa he.t.thaa paatimokkhasa.mvarassa upari jhaanaanuyogassa ca upakaaradhammaparidiipana.m. ^b^A.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii^eb^ti idamassa paatimokkhato acavanadhammataaparidiipana.m. ^b^Samaadaayaa^eb^ti idamassa sikkhaapadaana.m anavasesato aadaanaparidiipana.m. ^b^Sikkhatii^eb^ti idamassa sikkhaaya sama"ngiibhaavaparidiipana.m. ^b^Sikkhaapadesuu^eb^ti idamassa sikkhitabbadhammaparidiipana.m.

[03]^b^Indriyesuu^eb^ti idamassa guttadvaarataaya bhuumiparidiipana.m; rakkhitabbokaasaparidiipanantipi vadanti eva. ^b^Guttadvaaro^eb^ti idamassa chasu dvaaresu sa.mvihitaarakkhabhaavaparidiipana.m. ^b^Bhojane matta~n~nuu^eb^ti idamassa santosaadigu.naparidiipana.m. ^b^Pubbarattaapararatta.m jaagariyaanuyogamanuyutto^eb^ti idamassa kaara.nabhaavaparidiipana.m. ^b^Saatacca.m^eb^^a^P0.0324^ea^^b^nepakka^eb^nti idamassa pa~n~naapariggahitena viiriyena saataccakaaritaaparidiipana.m ^a^V0.0308^ea^. ^b^Bodhipakkhikaana.m dhammaana.m bhaavanaanuyogamanuyutto^eb^ti idamassa pa.tipattiyaa nibbedhabhaagiyattaparidiipana.m.
